83a1(mdo): gsum lung ston cig/ bdag 'dir lung bstan 'jig rten thos nas ni// sems kyang mchog tu rgya cher rab bskyed de// 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur// 'di na snod myin sems can gang
83a2(mdo): yang myed// bzhengs shig bzhengs shig stobs bcu mnga' ba'i lha// bdag la rjes su phan mdzad snum par gshegs// ji ltar bdag gi snum par khyod gshegs pa// de bzhin byang chub shing dbang drung bdag mchi// byang chub shing
83a3(mdo): dbang de rlung bdag mchis nas// myi g.yo myi 'gul bar ni gnas bcas te// byams pas der bcas bdud rnams pham bgyis nas// khyod kyis bsnyes bzhin byang chub thob par bgyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rba
83a4(mdo): 'od gzho nur gyurd pa'i gsol ba mkhyen nas// zla 'od gzho nur gyur da pal tshigs su bcad pas slar bka' saHla dpa// longs shig \u0f88\u0f90 'od rgyal ba'i sras// longs shika sbyin dga' sems can mchog/
83a5(mdo): longs shig snying rje tshul khrims brtan// zan la deng ni khyim du 'od// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs nas sngar ba dan las bzhengs te// sham thabs gsol/ chos gos
83a6(mdo): dang lhung bzed bsnams nas// dge slong 'bum du tshang ba'i dge slong gyi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shi nad tu mang pos bskor cing mdun tu bdar te// lha dang / klu
83a7(mdo): dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / drang srong dang / nam mkhal lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / srus po dang / rtsi dang myi ma yin pa brgya stong du mas mchod cing
83a8(mdo): mngon par bstod nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam gyis 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu gtong // sil snyan bye ba
83a9(mdo): khrag zhig brgya stong ni rab tu bkrol// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni mngon par bsgreng // gzugs dang / kha dog rags pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ngang pa dang / zhung zhung dang / dur pa
83b1(mdo): dang / gzhang dang / bkor dang / n+ya dang / dang / mi gas dang / 'a rgyug dang / ka 'bying na dang / kun las sogs pabya'i zhum // dus sgra snyan cing 'jam la mid du 'ong ba/ rnam pa sum 'byin pas na
83b2(mdo): bar snang la/ lha bzhin du so so'i nga ros rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byir// lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdug spos kyi snod yangs shing / che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad kyang bye dUr+ya dang / an da rnyil dang / shes dang /
83b3(mdo): spug ka yu ba can dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gzugs bzang dang / dbang po'i tog dang rad rod can dang / ba ku la dang lngas rtsen dang / shaka kya 'phel las batshogs pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gis lag pa
83b4(mdo): kanyis na/ gtun 'dzind pa bzhin du thogs te/ spos sbrul gyi snying po 'go sha risha dang / mr-i na ra dang / ha raM dang / ma la ya dang / tsan dan dmar po dang / a ga ru las bsogs pas bkang ba'i du ba ni 'thul// phyogs so so
83b5(mdo): nas lpags pa'i rgyal po dbang rtse ba/ dbang che bar grags pa'i nas na ta dang / ban klang brgyan gyis shin tu brgyand cing / mazhon par khrid pa'i tshogs du ma dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung gis yongs su
83b6(mdo): bskor cing lnga ldi mang po dang / rin po che'i 'phreng ba lag na thogs zhing sngon logs nas rkang kyis 'gro'o// rta dang glang po che legs parabargyan pa/ ma zhon par zhed pa dag kyang rang kyi stabs kyis mngod
83b7(mdo): par 'gro zhing skad yid du 'ong ba la snyan pa 'byind to// tshangs pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs nas mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed cing / 'gro'o// g.yon phyogs nas ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu dab che ba/ dbang
83b8(mdo): che bar klags pa/ rgya mo zhing rlabs chel/ bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams lha'i cod pa na babang po dang / gtu bu rgyan can dang / ra sa dang / du bu dang / me tog gargyan dang / rin po che'i song tshong dang / me tog gi 'brang bas lus
83b9(mdo): brgyan cing gzugs mngon par snang bas lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / mdog mdzes dang / ko bi dar dang / sA la ka dang / ku ra ba ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / dong ka'i me tog dang / mya ngan 'chang dang / skya sngar dang / a ti mug ta dang /
84a1(mdo): ud pa la dang / ba ku la dang / ma la ki la dang / kun da dang / ke sar dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / dri mchog dang / pad ma'i 'phreng ba dang / rin po che'i a ka ru dang / shing rin
84a2(mdo): po che'i 'bras bu can dag lag na thogs shing sil snyan sna tshogs brgya stong ni shin tu bkros// gos bye ba ni g.yo ba cings la la zhes ga zha'i sgra dag ni 'byid/ me tog gi char chen po ni rab tu 'bebs shing // bcom ldan 'das pa
84a3(mdo): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i ngos thams cad par 'tshams myed par gang bar 'khod de/ me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das chu dron yod
84a4(mdo): pa'i sgo nas rgyal po yang pa'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gdugs tshod la gshegs so// de'i tshe chos nyid ni 'di yin te// de la 'di skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pas dus mkhyen nas/ dpa' bo yon
84a5(mdo): tan kun gyis rab brgyan pa/ zhing rnams bsam gyis myi khyab snangamadzad cing // bcom ldan mye'i seng ge gshegs par gyur // s+yan ras gzigs dang mthu chen don yod dang // spos kyi khan yang rin chen
84a6(mdo): lag bzangs dang // ran chen tog dang 'byung dka' dpa' bo dang / de dang gzhan dag rgyal ba'i zham 'bring byed// g.yas phyogs na ni myi 'pham 'dug 'gyur te// de mying byams pa yon tan mtha' yas phyug
84a7(mdo): bar du ma chod sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste// bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyang rab tu rdzogs// byams dang btang snyoms dga' bas lus bsgoms shing // chos kyi bdag nyid chen po snying rjes bskyed// yon tan mtha' yas thub
84a8(mdo): dbang yon tan sems// bde gshegs thugs rje can gyi zham ring byed// de'i rjes la bskal pa bzang po'i// blo gros chen po ldan pa ji snyed pa// sangs rgyas stong du bzhis ma tshang ba dag/ de dag gis kyang byams pa mdun
84a9(mdo): tu bdang // gang sngon rgyal po'i thab kyi grong khyer 'dir// bskald pa dag la rgyal ba mtha' yas mchod// zla ba mdzes pa'i 'od 'dra lha'i lus// zla 'od dpa' bo yang ni mdun na 'dug/ snying rje mchog gi g.yon phyogs
84b1(mdo): 'dug pa ni// 'das dbul bye ba bcuphrag mang po dang // dpa' blon 'grus skyobs kyis mngon 'phags pa// brgyanag sa pa' las zhing du 'gro ba'o// de'i 'o// tu nyan pos dge 'dun te// sha mi'i bu 'on sel 'gas nas /
84b2(mdo): dang // 'od srung rab 'byor dka' bo ka pe na// bzab ldan rgyal po de bzhin ko luti nu// kun dga' de bzhin gnas brtan sgra gcan zin// legs 'ongs gron ci gang po 'char ba po// nam gru gsus tshan gnyer 'khor ma 'ag
84b3(mdo): pa// ral pa can ni stong du tshang ba dag/ nyan thos dge 'dun 'og tu thams cad kyang // dka' thub drag mchog rig byed chog shes// dmod pa 'dor dang phan 'dogs nus pa'i// drang srong dul ba zal sbyar 'dud pa byed// zhi ba'i
84b4(mdo): yid dang dul ba'i yid rnams kyis// sangs rgyas 'jig rten smon ma mdun bdar te// thugs rjer ldan pa'i mye'i seng ge gshegs// sems cad stong rnams rab tu tha dad par mdzad// ston sla mtshungs zla baH
84b5(mdo): bltar// ska tshogs dbang po yongs su dag pa bzhin// tshangs pa/ stong phrag dag ni brgya mang gis// mtshungs pa myed pa'i ston pa yod// sa su bskor// grong khyer gyi ni sgo steng zhabs bzhage ste/ nags
84b6(mdo): tshal stug por bcas pa'i sa yang g.yos// lha dang lha myin lto 'phye 'i tshogs kyang // me tog bzang po dri mchog 'thor bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs g.yas pa 'khor lo rin po ches
84b7(mdo): brgyan pa'i dge ba'i sa ba dpag tu myed pa bsags pa// sgo'i bem pa la bzhag sa lag tu// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams 'di nas pa drug tu gso so// rab tu gsos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos// 'bul/
84b8(mdo): rab tu 'phrul/ kun tu rab tu 'phrul/ ldeg/ rab tu snre/ kus gyu ba // 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'thugs/ des sem rab tu zhes ches/ kun tu rab tu ma dzes// bu bum rab tu 'amathu/
84b9(mdo): kun tu rab tu 'ur bur// shar phyogs dpal na nub phyogs ma'o// nub phyogs dmal na shar phyogs mamo// byang phyogs dpa' na lho phyogs mtho// lho phyogs dpa' na byang phyogs ma'o// mtha' dma' na dbus ma'o/
85a1(mdo): dbus dma' na mtha' mtho bar gyu rad nas// 'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung ngo // ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul grangs myed dpag tu myed pa gzhan dag kyang snang ngo // /
85a2(mdo): bam po// / de'i chos nyid 'di yin te// de la 'di skad ces bya'o// grong khyer mchog der 'dren pa gshegs pa na// sgo'i them pa la ni zhabs mchog bzhag pa'i tshe// de'i dpal gyis
85a3(mdo): sa 'di rab tu g.yos// grong khyer mchog 'di yi sems can rab tu dga'// myi dag bkres shing skom par gyur pa dag/ de tshe de dag skom pa myed par gyur // rgyal bas sgo'i them steng zhabs bzhag tshe// bkres shing skom pa dag
85a4(mdo): dang bral bar gyur// rgyal bas sgo'i them steng zhabs bzhag che/ dmus long gyurd pa'i myi gag ci yod dang // rna bas myi thos 'gor myed bsod nams chung // de dag thams cad myig dpa na ba thob// rgyal bas sgo'i
85a5(mdo): them steng zhabs bzhag che// gshin rje'i yul gyi yi dgas gang yod/ pa// shin tu sdug bsngal ngar snabs mchil ma za// thams cada'od kyis reg pas bde bar gyur// rgyal bas sgo'i them steng zhabs
85a6(mdo): bzhag tshe// brag gi rtse dpo r-i'i spyi bo dang // shing mchog sa la dang ni dong ka rnams// thams cad sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i phyogs su 'dud / rgyal bas sgo'i them steng zhabs bzhag tshe// rgya mtsho mthar thug
85a7(mdo): grong dang grong khyer rnams// sa kun rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// 'dir ni gag la yang gnod par gyur da pa myed// lha dang mye dang grul bum srin po dang // skyes bu gnas pa dga' mgu sems rangs te// byang chub dam pa
85a8(mdo): mchog la dang bskyed nas// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa'i thugs kyang 'dzin// rgyal bas sgo'i them steng zhabs bzhag tshe// sil snyan stong dag ma rdungs sgra 'byin te/ shaM nad tu yid 'ong rol mo'i dbyangs thos pas// de tshe ses
85a9(mdo): can thams cad rab tu dka'// sdong po stong phrag brgya dag 'dud par 'gyur// de tshe me tog kun kyang rab tu rgyas// bar snang las ni lha rnams brgya stong dag/ rgyal ba la yang myi myin mchod pa byed// rgyal bas sgo'i them steng zhabs
85b1(mdo): mag re// glang po brgyad gamams dag la smra byin te// sa dang 'a yang rgyal po sus kyang thod// ri dgas rgyam la seng ge sgra 'byin byed// sa dbang rgyal po gang su snyed cig/ phyogs dang phyogs 'ams rnams sa
85b2(mdo): pa rnams// rgyal ba'i dpal ka ni de 'bramathong das ni// rab tu sems dkalas la 'jug cing 'dud// kha cig 'jig rten 'akon la mngon par stod// kha cig brgyal la me tog char 'bebs shing // kha cig sor bcu
85b3(mdo): so sbyar nas su// e ma rgyal bzhugs rje can zhes smra// 'acig sa tig don la babang po dang // sna rtogs kun mang dka' bskyed 'bor bar byed// byang chub sems mchog dpe' byed bskyed nas su// 'acig ma'atha' ri
85b4(mdo): chen 'thor bar byed// kha cig gser gyi dra ba bzang po 'thor// kha cig me tog rgyan bzang 'thor bar byed// la la gser gyi rgyan ni dam pa 'thor// kha cig de bzhin gdu bu 'thor bar byed// la la gdu bu bzang po der
85b5(mdo): 'thor te// kha cig rin chen spras pa'i dpung rgyan 'thor// kha cig bdag cag sangs rgyas gyur da cig ces// sems bskyed kos phran bzang po 'thor bar byed// 'jig rten mgon po sgo na bzhugs
85b6(mdo): pa'i tshe// myi dag kha cig gser gi tshong cho 'thor// sems dang gtsug gi nor bu mchog kyang 'thor// la la rin chen dra ba 'thor b.rabyed// sems can shin tu myi bzad sdug bsngal zhing // gtse ba
85b7(mdo): rnam mang zug cus zug pa yang // 'dren pa skyes bu gtso bo dpal gyis ni// thams cad bde ba dang yang ldan par 'gyur// 'u byu ka dang ni ri skyegs ma bya dang // de bzhin zhung zhung dag ni mtsho bya dang // bya mang kun ni nam
85b8(mdo): mkhar 'dug nas su// shin tu yid 'ong mchog gi sgra yang 'byin// de tshe bya tshogs mang po rab dga' bas// 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra phyung ste// gang gis snyan pa'i sgra skad de thos pa// de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang
85b9(mdo): gti mug zhi// sems can bye bas dga' ba'i sgra thos nas// thams cad rjes su mthun pa'i bzod thob ste// ma 'ongs dus na rgyal bar mkhyen 'gyur zhes// de dag kun la bde gshegs lung yang ston// de'i dus na nyon
86a1(mdo): tsamongs myi 'byung ste// chos kyi rgyal ba thams cad ri mor bcas// de me 'dren pa'i sku byad mthong nas ni// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la mos bskyed de// bdag cag nam zhig 'di 'dra'i mkhyen thob snyam// bsam/
86a2(mdo): pha babyen nas rdul ba lung spyod te// bde bar gshegs pa'i ba u 'u de nas// 'od gaper dag ni stong phrag brgyasang 'byung // de las lhag par gang ga'i bye snyed de// de dag gi sa pa mtsham sa bzung kyi nus// de me nyi ma'i 'o
86a3(mdo): kyang kyi snang ste// kye dang nor bu lha kun 'od kyang byed// rgyal ba grong gshegs sangs rgyas rnam mdzes pa// de tshe 'od rnams thams cad yod kyi mngod// tshogs chen dang ni bde gshegs lam bzhud de// gang du stobs bcu
86a4(mdo): ni zhabs 'jog par// sa la pad ma dag ni stong phrag brgya// 'dab sa bye ba stong ldan gtsang ma byung // 'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs ba'i che// de la nyal nyis kyi gtsang myed par gyur// grong khyer zas/
86a5(mdo): cad dri mchog gdug pa yi// spos dang yid du 'ong ba kun nas ldang // grong dang srang rnams yongs su dag 'gyur te// rdo dang gseg ma skye// da cing spos chus btab// stobs bcu ldan pa'i bsod nams de
86a6(mdo): 'dra ste// rnam pa sna tshogs me tog sil ma bkram// gnod sbyin brgya stong gtum por sems pa dag/ sangs rgyas myaM dbang gser 'dra mthong bas ni// 'dren la dga' ba rgya cher rab bskyed nas// sangs
86a7(mdo): rgyas chos dang dge 'dun skyabs su 'gro// lha rnams bye ba dang ni brgya phrag stong // mye dbang lta bar 'ongs pa de dag kun// bde bar gshegs la me tog char phab ste// me tog gtor nas nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug/ rgyas
86a8(mdo): la myi yis me tog gang gtor pa// nam mkha'i ngos la me tog gdugs su gyur// lha rnams kyis ni me tog gtor ba yang // sa steng lha yaM me tog bkram par gyurd// lha dang myi dang grul bum srin po rnams// de ma/
86a9(mdo): nas ni nam yang ngoms kyi myong // mgon po stobs bcu ldan pa mthong nas kyang // rab tu dga' zhing sems bde rangs par gyur // nam che skyes bu mchog gi sku mthong nas// sems can thams cad dga' mgu rangs
86b1(mdo): gyurd pas// lha'i me tog dag la yang yid myi sems// de dag la ni ngo mtshar 'dzin pa myed// stobs bcu'i g.yas phyogs na ni tshangs pa ste// de bzhin g.yon na brgya byin lha'i rgyal// nam mkha'i dkyil na lha mangs bye
86b2(mdo): 'khod de// skyes bu mchog la shin tu gus pa bskyed// lha dang lha byin dag gis rgyal ba bskor/ lha dang myi'i dpal gzi kun phrogs nas// zhabs mthil sa la rim 'byin bzhin du// grong khyer du ni bcom ldan spyan drangs
86b3(mdo): gshegs// sku lus dpe byad bzang pos rgyas pa ni// nas ka skar ma dag gis gang ba bzhin// nam ka la ni zla ba nya ba ltar// rgyal ba'i lam na sangs rgyas lam me gshegs// nor bu rin chen nam yang bzang po ni/
86b4(mdo): nyes pa'i skyon bral rab tu snang bar byed// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su yang 'od gtsang byung // de bzhin rgyal ba 'jig rten kun snang mdzad// lha dang lha min dag gis rgyal ba bskor// myi'i gtso bo rgyal po'i
86b5(mdo): khab tu gshegs// zhabs mthil sa lo ri mo byin bzhin du/ zla 'od gzho nu'i khyim du sangs rgyas gshegs// grong khyer mchog ni/ kun tu legs brgyan te// rgyal mtshan bye ba phrag stong rab tu
86b6(mdo): bsgreng // de yis kun spos bzang rnam par byugs// yid 'ong de bzhin dbyar gyi me tog gtor// gang tshe bde gshegs gtam rnams ston pa na// mgon po srang bzhud myi la thugs brtse'i phyir// rgyal
86b7(mdo): bas der ni 'phrul pa rnam 'phrul te// de dag la yang sangs rgyas chos bzang ston// srog chags brgya stong dag gis de thos nas// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la smon lam 'debs// nam bdag 'di 'dra'i ye shes thob
86b8(mdo): snyam ste// bsam pa mkhyen nas rgyal ba lung yang ston// gang gis rgyal ba myi dbang spyan drangs pa'i// sbyin pa de ni mu mtha' myed gyurd te// rnyed mchog bsam gyis myi khyab des rnyed ces// la la dag ni de la mos pa
86b9(mdo): bskyed// 'khor ba dag na shi nad tu mthong dka' ba// skye dgu dag la phan mdzad thugs kyang brtse// thugs rje can de bdag gis sa pa la yang // s+yan drangs snyam du la la sems kyang bskyed// la la ba gam mchog gi steng
87a1(mdo): 'dug cing // lus ni 'inang tu stug cing mangs par brgyan// byang chub sems mchog dam pa bskyed nas ni// stobs bcwa ldan la lha'i me tog 'thor// la las bla myed sems mchog rab bskyed nas// se/
87a2(mdo): tog cas pa mdzes pa'i 'phreng ba dang / mati mug ta de bzhin dbyar gyi spos// dar gyi lda ldi dag kyang la la 'thom// ba cig gos kyis shin da tu lus brgyan te// me tog babang po dag kyang thogs shing 'greng // me tog
87a3(mdo): tshogs dar kyi lnga ldi logs// rgyal ba mthu chen de'i phyogs su 'bor// la la pad ma dang ni ku mu ta// ud pal gser gi me tog bzang po 'thor// la la rin chen me tog der 'thor te// la la tsan dan phye ma 'thor bar
87a4(mdo): byed// 'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa'i che// ngo mtshar dpag tu myed pa rnams kyang 'byung // mtshungs myed de dag brjod par myi nus te// sangs rgyas ye shes skye bo bye mdangs bkod// kyi che myi gdung bden pa
87a5(mdo): mthong ba dang // gzhan yang gya nom snang ba dag dang shin tu mthong / de bzhin 'og myin 'dod chags bral ba rnams// thams cad kyi dbang de lta phyir nye bar lhags// de bzhin dge ba'i lha rnams dpag myed/
87a6(mdo): dang // dge chung lha gzhan dag kyang sems dga' zhing // dge rgyas zag zhig dpag tu myed pa rnams// 'dren pa drang srong chen po lta bya lhags// chang myed 'od kyang de bzhin dpag myed dang // 'od chung /
87a7(mdo): gi ni lha rnams ji yod dang // 'od gsal ba yang khrag khrig mang po dor// 'jig rten mgon po lta phyir de dag lhags// tshangs 'khor ba dag brgya stong mang po dang // tshangs pa'i 'dun 'don dad pa de bzhin te// tshangs 'as
87a8(mdo): kyang ni brgya phrag sa pa pa rnams// thams cad 'dren pa lta phyir nye bar lhags// de bzhin ka' 'phrul gyi yang lha rnams dang // gzhan yang 'phrul dga'i sems can dag pa dang // dga' ldan 'thab bral sna rnams rab dag
87a9(mdo): ring // thams cad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshas nye bas rnags// bcu byed pa rgyas sus bcus gsus pa// sna'i bus bye babargya dang lpags// 'di des tog ra sa par 'byebs shing // sangs rgyas thub dpangs phyi nye
87b1(mdo): sngags// phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po yang // nam thos bu dang klu dbang myig myi bzang // yul 'khor srung dpa' phags skyes sems dka' ste// de kun gyi dbang bstod cing nye bar lhags// gnod sbyin rgyal po mgu/
87b2(mdo): ldan ar bar yang // dga' ba skyes shing gnod sbyin brgyas bskor te// nam ka'i dkyil na 'dug cing sems dga' nas// me tog sna tshogs du ma'i char yang 'bebs// rtag tu myos dpa 'phreng 'dzin lha rnams kyang // spos
87b3(mdo): dang 'phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs thogs// 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad sems dka' zhing // de ni skyes bu mchog la mchod pa byed// gnod sbyin lag na gzhong thogs mang po yang // gnod sbyin bu mo de dag rab brgyan te/
87b4(mdo): gnod sbyin rol mo rab tu snyan pa dang // shin tu yid 'ong brgyas ni sangs rgyas mchod// glu dbyangs sil snyan 'jas zhing snyan pa la/ mkhas pa'i skyen ci'i bu ma stong // rgya'am che'i rgyal po ljon pa dang /
87b5(mdo): rgyal mchog mchod par spos dang ldang las lhags// bde mchog stobs ldan sgra gcan zag bzangs ris// lha myin bu mo stong gi 'di ra bcas dang // lha myin rdzu 'phrul chen po gzhan yang ya / rin po che
87b6(mdo): cham phab nye bar lhags// srin po khrag theg brgya phrag mtha' yas kyang // srin po bye ba brgya yis bsnyed bkur zhing // me tog sil ma sna tshogs mang po yang // skyes bu mchog la gus par rab tu 'thor// klu'i rgyal /
87b7(mdo): ro ba legs pa yang // 'khor mang de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du lhags// rin chen me tog nam mang mchog thogs shing // bde gshegs zhabs gnyis la ni rab tu btud// klu dbang pad ma dang ni pad ma che// de bzhin nor yod/
87b8(mdo): mtha' yas gdengs ka can// de dag khyu mchog drung ngu nyer lhags te// bde bar gshegs la gus par rab tu 'dud// klu'i rgyal po nor bu yid dga' zhing // khyu mchog zhabs kyi drung du nye bar 'ongs// klu'i me tog dri zhim mchog
87b9(mdo): thogs te// ha cang myi ring bde gshegs s+yan sngar 'dug/ de bzhin ma dros klu'i rgyal po yang // klu'i bu mo shi nad tu bslabs pa'i mchog/ rnga dang sil snyan stong phrag brgya rdung zhing // 'jig rten mgon po mchod phyir nye
88a1(mdo): bar lhags// ma dros pa'i bu mo lnga brgya dag/ ye shes yangs pa bla myed tshol ba'i phyir// gnyen 'dab dag gis bskor cing dga' gyur da nas// rang gis rang byung mchod phyir nye bar lhags// de bzhin klu'i
88a2(mdo): rgyal po seg myed kyang // skyes bu mchog la zal sbyar rab btud nas// klu'i mu tig mdzes shing bzang ba thogs// mkha' la 'dug nas mthu rgyal mchod pa byed// de bzhin klu'i rgyal po btang bzung yang // rab tu yid bde
88a3(mdo): dkal mgu skyes nas ni// rin chen mu tig sna tshogs thogs nas su// der 'ongs 'dren pa la yang mngon par 'thor// de bzhin klu'i rgyal po dus can yang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du nyer 'ongs te// dga' zhing rin
88a4(mdo): chen 'phreng ba mdzes mchog thogs// skyes bu dam pa la yang mchod rab byas// de yang bde gshegs yon tan rjes dran zhing // gus pa chen po shin tu bskyed nas ni// gnyen 'dab klu mang dag gis de
88a5(mdo): bskor cing // 'dren pa'i bsngags pa rnam pa mang po brjod// de bzhin klu dbang dka' bo nye dka' dang // de bzhin 'jog po 'gre/ 'u ta ma nag po yang // rgyal tha lta zhing der ni nye bar 'ongs//
88a6(mdo): bde bar gshegs pa'i zhabs la 'dud pa byed// klu'i rgyal po e lo'i 'dab ma yang // thub mchog rgyal ba 'od srung dran pa dang // bdag nyid myi 'om skyes pa mthong nas ni// klu brgyas yongs su bskor cing bya zhing
88a7(mdo): 'ongs// kye ma bdag sdod the tsom byung gyur da te// bdag gis e la 'dab stong sngon bcad pas// des ni myi khom par yang bdag skyes te// rgyal ba'i chos ni rig par sla ba myin// shin tu smad pa skye ba'i lus 'di dang // klu
88a8(mdo): 'i skye gnas bdag gis rab spangs la// chos gang byang chub snying por skyes mchog gis// rtogs pa bsil ba bdag gis rtogs par bya// klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'khor los sgyur// bye ba gsum snyed klu'i 'khor gyis bsko/
88a9(mdo): chu lha gzi can rin chen do shal thogs// bcom ldan 'das la mchod phyir nye bar 'ongs// rgyal ba la ni rdo 'phangs des bzung ste// de'i tshe na nam mkha' la 'ab 'dug 'gyur ba// rgyal po khab kyi gnod sbyin ci zhig 'dzin da//
88b1(mdo): xxx
88b2(mdo): da ts+tsha / 'dod sbyid snron nams 'jigs kyad / gang gnas na gdod sbyid da// rgyal par byung chung du par rnags// dbang ba con dang
88b3(mdo): rdo cang/ dkus dang pa'i sa sa sde po dang // garing skyid dbang po gzhan yang sto dmas ni// gdug spos sdod dmas sogs shing nye ba lhags// lus dbyibs ma legs kyi sdug mang po rnams// gzugs
88b4(mdo): kyi rnam pa yang zhing rgyan bor ba// de'i dus na brgya stong mang po dag/ gnod sbyin gyi ni me tog thogs te lhags// 'ake'u ta ma'i ri'i byi phur bu rgyal byed dang // ke'u shi ka dang 'od srung mar kan dang // thams cad
88b5(mdo): bshes dang / bar sha gar ka dag/ thams cad sangs rgyas phyag/ da 'tshal nye bar lhags// myo sbyin ma pa ni de bzhin dka' mgu ste/ drang srong rgyas pa kud tsasang ki ra// shed can ngan spong bad chag
88b6(mdo): 'jog rnams// de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags// 'jam na ba man pa'i sham pa la dang // 'jam ka ni dang ni gragamakhar drang srong mchog/ dka' bar gnas dang byi'u zung sbyin
88b7(mdo): ba rnams// 'dren pa lta zhing grong khyer mchog tu lpags// drang srong mthong nas de che drung srong dga'// thub rgyal thabs mchog la ni phyag 'tshal cing // 'jig rten sgrol la phyag byas mngon bstod de// thal lo
88b8(mdo): sbyar nas dpal ba'i pyan sngar 'greng // 'jig rten ji yod drang srong mang po kun// de dag myi dbang lta bar nyer lhags te// mthong nas mchod pa rgya cher byas nas kyang // sangs rgyas spyan sngar thal mo rab sbyar 'dug/
88b9(mdo): rgya mtsho dag ra gnas pa'i nam ka lding // bram ze'i cha byad du yang stsal byas nas// cod pan sna tshogs blta na stug pa thogs// bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal nam mkhar 'khod// grong brgyad dang ni 'dzam gling nags tshal
89a1(mdo): tsan/ gnas zhing rten pa'i lharnams gang song dang // grong gi sna mom lus thams cad kyang // nye bar lpags zhing gtso bos thongad 'byed// nags cas kyi yang lha rnams mthal yas dang // pi'i lha rnams thams cad te/
89a2(mdo): bar 'ongs// 'bab chu'i lha kun mthal dag de bzhin du// 'dren pa mchod pa byed cing nye bar lhags// mya ngan dgon pa'i lha mo brgya rnams dang // ri'i rtse mo li lha mo ji snyed ma lus dang // mtsho dang chu myig rdzid kyi lha rnams dang /
89a3(mdo): mtsho'i lha yang sangs rgyas drung du lhags// lha dang lha myin klu dang gnod sbyin tshogs// myi 'am ci dang grul bum nam mkha' ldingapa// de bzhin yi dgas srul po mang po dag// skyes bu mchog la ri mor bya ba byed// 'dran pa grong khyer
89a4(mdo): mchog der gshegs pa na// rgyal ba mchog la de dag mchod pa byed// lha dang lha myin klu dang gnod sbyin rgyal// lta bas rtag tu chog par yongs myi 'gyur// sngon gyi srid par 'jig rten mgon po yis// sngon gi
89a5(mdo): rgyas ba dag la mchod mchog byas// bsod nams 'bras bu smin pa de 'dra ste// skyes bu myi dang lta bas ngoms myi myong // rgyal bas/ sangs rgyas zhing du 'od btang tshe// lhun po de bzhin rab lhun 'khor
89a6(mdo): yug ri// kha ba can gyi ri dang spos dang ldang // de dag rgyal ba'i 'od la sgrub pa myed // sangs rgyas zhing 'di rgya mtsho ci yod pa// de dag de tshes dang 'dra bar gyur // sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad
89a7(mdo): kun tu yang // me tog dag gis gtor cing mnyam par gyur// 'od gzor brgya stong dpag tu myed pa dag/ chos kyi rgyal po'i zhabs kyi mthil nas byung // sems can dmyal ba thams cad bsil bar gyur // sdug bsngan
89a8(mdo): myed par byas nas bde ba myong // de ni stobs bcu ldan pas chos bshad pas// lha dang kyil myig kyang rnam par dag/ srog chags brgya stong dpag tu byed pa rnams// thams cad sangs rgyas ye shes nges par gyur // 'dren pa
89a9(mdo): grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa na// bde gshegs cho 'phrul mang po dag gis ni// bskal pa bye bar brjod du gyi sra ste// rgyal ba der gshegs 'gro ba thams cad dga'// bde gshegs yon tan de dag dpag myed de// mya
89b1(mdo): mchog yon tan rab kyi pha rol phyind// yon tan khyad par kun kyi pha rol sonang // sangs rgyas bsod nams zhing la bgos phyag 'tshal// / grong khyer du gshegs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//
89b2(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das zla 'od gzho nur gyurd pa'i khyim gyi srad du byung ste// zla 'od gzho nur gyurd pa'i khyim du gshegs so// gshegs nas bdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa'i dge
89b3(mdo): 'dun dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun kyang so so nas gar 'os pa'i stan la 'khod do// de nas zla 'od gzho nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang // dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas//
89b4(mdo): mchod yon chen po rim gyis gsos te// zhal bas ro brgya dang ldan pa bab pa zhing yang ba'i bza' ba dang // bca' ba dang / bsngag pa dang / bzhib pa dang / btung ba rnams bdag nyid kyis gsol cing bdang /
89b5(mdo): te// bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas// lhung bzed bzhan ste// phyag bcabs par rig nas// ras bcos bu phrugs bye ba stong// phrag brgya ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol to// byang
89b6(mdo): chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang so sor chos gos sum phrugs phul nas// stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzor nas// bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man
89b7(mdo): dar bas gtor te// mchod cing mngon par bstod nas// bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod do// skyes pa myed cing 'gags myed pa// sku lus kyi mnga' bas mo mye khyab// gzus
89b8(mdo): dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs// yon tan rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo shes rab mchog gis bskyed// thabs dang stobs kyi rtsal kyang mnga'// sangs rgyas dma'a' 'dra ba ste// bzod mthar phyin la phyag 'tshal lo//
89b9(mdo): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhugs pa'i spyod yus te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims mal rab tu dgal dang bde// btung bar ting nge 'dzind te bshos su bsam gtan mchog/ ston nyid dkon par gnas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal
90a1(mdo): ka/ sa pas mun par brtsams 'as// gzugs kyi nus bston par sa dang // sems cad da sazums thas 'phyir// lam dang shos kya rnamal bar gdang// mes sangs rgyas bams kyi
90a2(mdo): 'jig rten kun gyi 'dren pa ste// 'jig rten 'di ni khyod mchod nas// mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu mchi// myi mnyam mnyam pa'i mgon gcig pa la de skad bstod// gzho nu yid kyang rab tu dkar gyur da cig smras pa// sangs
90a3(mdo): rgyas mtshungs myed bsam yas sku mnga' bshos gsol bas// lho'i lha khyod bzhin du bdag kyang sangs rgyas gyur // de ltar zla 'od gzho nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la lho'i zhal zas ro brgya pa ni gzhos par gsol//
90a4(mdo): lha'i na bza' rin tad myed pa phrugs kyis ni sku la gsol// lho'i me tog man da ras ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod// tshul dnga'adra ba'i chag sa su bcad pas ni mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka
90a5(mdo): la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te// bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis/ tshigs su bcad pas zhu ba zhus pa// byang chub sems dpa' mkha/ sa pas tsa s+yad na// rtag tu chos rnams rang bzhin rab tu 'tshal
90a6(mdo): mkhas pas bgyi ba dag la ji ltar 'jug/ bgyi bar 'jug par 'dren pas bstan du gsol// 'dren pa skye ba dran pa ji ltar yu/ ji ltar mngal dag tu yang yod myi skye// ji lta bur na 'khor rnams myi phyed 'gyur
90a7(mdo): 'dis ji ltar spobs pa mthal las 'gyur// sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu ma byed// chos rnams kun la mngon par ma khyend pa 'dug/ rkang gnyis gtso bo bil gyis phyi non pa// zhu ba shu yis bdag la sung spyod/
90a8(mdo): cig/ chos kyi rang bzhin dngos myed rab mkhyen la// brjod du myed pa'i tshig tu brjod par mad // seng ges la rnams ji ltar 'pham bgyis pa// mu stegs gzhan la yang sangs rgyas de bzhin te/ sems can kun gyi phyid
90a9(mdo): pa rab mkhyend cing // chos rnams kun la ye shengs su 'jug/ ye shes chags myed dpyod yul yongs su dag/ chos kyi mnga' bdag bdag la de lung bstan// 'das pa mkhyen cing ma 'ongs de bzhin te// daltar 'di na tsa mchen
90b1(mdo): pa yang mkhyen// dus gsum la ni ye shes thogs myed 'jug/ de phyir bdag zhu shig kya seng ge sa// dus gsum ldan pa'i rgyal ba'i chos nyid ni// chos kyi rgyal pos chos nyid rab tu mkhyend// rang 'byung chos kyi ngo bo
90b2(mdo): nyid la mkhas// de phyir bdag u ye shes rgya mtsho la// khyod la 'khrul dpa'i chos ni ci yang byed// de bas khyod kyi sems pa ma lus spangs// bdud spangs tha ba gti mug rab tu bcad// myi dbang bdag la byang chub 'apyod pa
90b3(mdo): spyon// chos kyi mtshan nyid je 'dras rgyal bas mkhyen// chos kyi mtshan nyid de 'drar bdag la ston// bdag gis mtshan nyid de 'dra'i chos rtogs nas// mtshad nyid de 'dra'i byang chub spyod pa gyud// sems cad pyod pa
90b4(mdo): gyi mthun mtha' yas pa// ji ltar pyod pa pyad par 'jug la lags// gang thos sems can pyod pa 'tshal 'gyur ba// gyod la 'jug pa bdag la bshad du gsol// mtshan nyid myi mthun chos kyi rang bzhin mtshan/
90b5(mdo): ngo bo nyid stong rang bzhin nas dag pa// byang chub sems dpas ji lta dar mngon gsum 'gyur// chos kyi tshul rnams bdag la bstan tu ga sol// 'di la chos rnams kun gyi pha rol du phyi nang// bstan
90b6(mdo): pa'i tshig kun la yang shind tu mkhas// the tsom myi mngal nem nur bcom chod// bdag la sangs rgyas byang chub bstan tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzho nur gyur pa'i sems
90b7(mdo): kyi rtog pa sems kyis mkhyen nas// zla 'od gzho nur gyur pa la bka' sa lad pa// gzho nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na yon tan 'di dag rab tu thob ste// myur du bla na myed pa yang dag
90b8(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ gzho nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa yin no// gzho nu ji ltar na byang chub
90b9(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes she na// gzho nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad mying dang bral bar rab tu shes so// chos thams cad sgra myed pa'i tshig gi la
91a1(mdo): // dang bral ba/ yi ge dang bral ba/ skye ba dang bral ba/ 'gog pa dang bral ba// rgyu dang mtshan nyid kyi mthun pa/ dben pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid byed par mtshan nyid gcig pa// mtshan ma dang bral ba/
91a2(mdo): bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ bsam pa dang bral ba/ yid dang bral bar rab tu shes so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// chos rnams bstan pa gcig po ni// chos rnams
91a3(mdo): thams cad mtshan nyid myed// yang dag ji bzhin rab mkhyen pas// shes rab mchog gis bshad pa yin// de lta bur ni chos rnams bstan// byang chub sems dpa' sus shes pa// mdo sde bye ba rab stond kyang /
91a4(mdo): de la byang chub rgyun 'chad myed// 'dren pa byin gyis brlabs pas rlabs pas na// yang dag nyid kyi mtha' yang shes// yang dag mtha' de rab shes na// de la ci yang bshad pa myed// gcig gis kyang ni zas
91a5(mdo): cad shes// gcig gis kyang ni thams cad mthong // ji snyed mang por bshad na yang // de la dregs pa skye ba myed// chos rnams / thams cad bdag myed par// de ltar sems kyis nges brtags/
91a6(mdo): shing // mying du bstand pa bslabs pas na// yang dag nyid du chag/ kyang smra// sgra dbyangs gang dag ci thos pa// de'i sngon gyi mtha' shes te// sgra'i sngon gyi mtha' shes nas// sgra dag gis ni de myi 'phrogs
91a7(mdo): sgra'i sngon mtha' mi 'dra bar// chos rnams mtshan nyid de bzhin te// chos rnams de ltar rab shes na// mngal du skye bar myi 'gyur ro// chos rnams thams cad myi skye zhing // 'byung ba myed par rab tu shes// bstand pa 'di ni rab
91a8(mdo): shes na// rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur// nam zhig skye ba dran 'gyur na// de tshe bya ba dag la 'jug/ bya ba dag la zhugs pa'i// 'khor rnams shin tu myi phyed 'gyur// de ltar chos rnams stong par ni// byang chub sems dgra/
91a9(mdo): sus shes pa// des ni gang yang myi shes myed// 'di ni ci yang myed pa'i mtha'// ci yang myed pa'i mtha' la yang // byis pa bdag gis ji dag brtags// bskasad pa bye bar de dag shes// yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'gyur//
91b1(mdo): rjesar 'dren pas ma byed du pa bzhin// gsad de dag tsug shin du// da ga las sdug bsdus kyi b+he ste// ngan 'gro rnams su ya de mi 'gro// so so yi skye bo thams cad kyis// de ltar tshul 'di ma shes pas// gang du chog
91b2(mdo): rnams 'gag pa yi// 'di 'dra'i chos rnams spong bar byed// chos kun rnyed pa myed par ni// chos kyi 'du shes gang byung ba// de lta bu 'i 'du shes de// 'du shes de ltar rig par gyis// rnam par shes dang 'du shes su// byis
91b3(mdo): pa 'dag gis 'di brtags te// brtags pa'i ni chos rnams la// mkhas pa 'dir ni rmongs myi 'gyur// stong pa rnyog pa myed pa'i chos// 'di ni mkhas pa'i sa yin te// de la byis pa'i spyod yul myed// sangs rgyas
91b4(mdo): sras kyi khyod yul lo// zhi ba stong par rab bstan pa// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa// 'di ni sangs rgyas sras 'apyod pa// sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyan yin no// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag/ bar
91b5(mdo): chags rab tu spangs gyur da pa// de dag gzugs kyis myi 'phrogs te/ sangs rgyas rigs la de dag gnas// chos rnams thams cad gnas/ byed de// de dag la ni gnas yod byin// gang gis de ltar kasa?
91b6(mdo): shes pa// de la byang chub rnyed kyi dka'// sbyin dang tshul khrims thos dang bzod// bshes gnyen bzang po bsten byas nas// bya ba 'di dag/ nam rig na// byang chub myur du de 'tshang rgya// de la lha klu rtag tu/
91b7(mdo): bkrum sti byed// gnod sbyin lha byin lto 'bri ji ba dag// nam mkha' ldeng gi rgyal po thams cad dang // rtse 'am ci dang srin po mchong ba byed// sangs rgyas bye ba de'i snyan pa 'arjod// bskal pa byem por gyi 'chad par/
91b8(mdo): chos bshad pa'i bsngags pa brjod na srung // de'i su mthal zad par nus kyi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong zhes pa// de ni srog chags kyi ba'i'adod yar byed// shis tu ngas pa 'khoms chos stod to// thos nas dang
91b9(mdo): dngar sor byed pa bzud// de dag gi gi mi shes yangs pa 'byung // de kyir rgyal ba phyi mchog sa song bar 'gyur// zhi brnams nas bkod pa palapopo mthong // 'dzin nyid mgon pa de la chos rnams thod// chos kun smram /
92a1(mdo): bur shes par gyis// ji ltar bar snang bzhin stong pa ltar// de dag gi yang rang bzhin de 'drar shes// de ltar spyod pa ci la 'ang chags myi 'gyur// ye shes chags pa myed pas don byed cing // 'jig rten na
92a2(mdo): yang byang chub kyad mchog myod// shes pas chos kun la 'ang rab brtags te// de dag zhing rnams gzhan du stsal pa 'gyed// stsal pa de dag sangs rgyas don byas nas// ji ltar chos nyid bzhin du rang bzhin 'gyur// byang
92a3(mdo): chub sems la myi gag gnas pa rnams// bsam pa ji bzhin don rnams rnyed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rigs ni gnas par gang brtson pa// de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas byas pa gzo// rnam par 'bar ba'i lus dngarab ldan zhing //
92a4(mdo): mtshan bzang sum bcu rtsa gnyis de la 'byung // phan yon gzhan yang mang po mtha' yas pa// ting 'dzin mchog la spyod pas thob par 'gyur// rtag tu mye skul chos kyang spyod par 'gyur// de'i gzi brjid rgyal pos mya
92a5(mdo): bzod de// mkhas pa su dag sangs rgyas chos spyod pa// byad bzhin bzang zhing shin tu mdzes par 'gyur// bsod nams gzi brjid dpal gyis mdo/ na 'phags te// lhas kyang de'i gzi brjid bzod myi 'gyur//
92a6(mdo): su dag byang chub sems la rten gnas pa// de ni rtag tu srog chags kun gyi bshes// sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni rab stond pa// de la nam yang mun pa myed par 'gyur// sgra dang tshig gi lam bral brjod du myed/
92a7(mdo): nam mkha' ji bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin te// 'di lta bu'i tshul mchog rnam rig na// de'i spobs pa dag kyang kyi zad 'gyur// mdo sde dag ni brgya stong rab bshad kyang // sngon gyi mtha' ma phra ba rab tu shes// chos kyi rang bzhin
92a8(mdo): shind tu phra shes pas// mkhas pa'i tshig ni rtag tu thogs pa byed// rtag par tshul brgya dag la mkhas gyurd cing // sgra dang nges tshig rnam pa mapal mkhas// las dnga'abras bu rnam sbyin nges pa ste// khyad par 'phags po ma
92a9(mdo): bye brag de 'drar 'gyur// mkhas pa bdag nyid chen po stobs bcu'i sras/ ma tshang myed pa'i stobs kyi shugs 'ja bzhing // shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// de'i dran pa rtag par yongs su dag/ shin tu phra ba'i rang
92b1(mdo): ro zhes pas/ song du mya 'ong na ni thos kyi 'gyur// rtag tu gyun cing yid 'ong na yang thos// de'i tshig ni rtag tu ming 'ong 'gyur// shinang tusmra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// rma dang bri gro ma shes rab rtogs dang /
92b2(mdo): ldan// de bzhin sems kyang rnyog myed dang bar 'gyur// mdo sde brgya phrag du ma rab tu 'chad// yon tan 'di 'dra'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// yi ge dang ni tshig rnams 'byed la mkhas// tha dad pa'i sgra ma pa du ma shes//
92b3(mdo): don dang tshig 'phrul yang mkhas par 'gyur// shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// lha dang myi dang klu 'brug srin po dang // lha myin lto 'phye myi 'am ci la yang // rtag tu stug cing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// shin tu phra ba
92b4(mdo): chos shes pas// 'byung po yi dgaso srin po'i tshogs rnams ni// sha la za ba shi nad tu myi bzad pa// de dag nam yang de la 'jigs myi skyed// mkhas pa de dag yangs pa'i gtam thos nas// shi nad tu dga' zhing ba su zer
92b5(mdo): zhes byed// sangs rgyas la yang dga' ba rgya cher bskyed// de dag bas mo gyis myi khyab don chen thob// bde bar gshegs pa'i chos mdze/ da 'di bzung ba// bskal pa stong ma pa de'i bsod nams stobs
92b6(mdo): rab tu brjod kyang rdzogs par myi nus te// dpag tu byed cing mtha'ayas tshad myed do// ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di bzung ba la yis/ 'das pa'i rgyal ba dpag myed thams cad dang // sangs rgyas ma
92b7(mdo): byon pa dang phyogs bcu na// sangs rgyas gang bzhugs de dag de yis mchod// skyes bul la bsod nams 'dod pas 'dir// stobs bcu ldan pa'i thugs rje can dag la// dga' ba dpag tu myed pa bskyed nas ni// bskal
92b8(mdo): pa mtha' yas dpag myed rim 'gror byas// skyes bu gnyis po bsod nams 'dod pa yis// don dam tshul 'di las ni tshigs bcad gcig/ phyi ma'i dus su gyur da tsha 'dzind pa ni// de la snga ma'i bsod nams char mya phod/
92b9(mdo): 'di ni sangs rgyas mchod pa rab mchog ste// phyi ma gyi babang dus su gyur pa'i tshe// 'di las tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad gcig thos nas// 'dzid pa la ni sangs rgyas thams cad mchod// de dag rtag tu rnyed mchog legs pa/
93a1(mdo): rnyed// de dag grong gi mas mchog legs par 'os// stobs bcu'i sras kyi bu zo ngas pa ste// de mis rnal pa mang po yun rib mchod// bya rgod phung po'i mi 'dir nga yang mthong // de dag sangs rgyas
93a2(mdo): mkhyen sa ngas supa bstan// mya ngan pa 'das nas ni byams pa yang // de re de la yub yang ston par 'gyur// de bzhin sangs rgyas med dpag myed pa yang // pa'i bde ba can du kun 'dod zhes// phan yin rnam pa bum des
93a3(mdo): 'chang // mngon dgal der song sangs rgyas kyi 'khrugs mthong // bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu myed par yang // log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa yod myi 'byung // byang chub pyad pa mchog 'di myod pa ni// rtag tu yid ra
93a4(mdo): bde ba myong bar 'gyur// de phyir bye brag 'di 'phags de 'dra ste// 'di ni rab tu bshad pa phan yon mchog/ so so'i tshig la ba'i rjes slobs la// phyi ma'i dus la mdo sde 'di zung shig/ mdo sde 'dzind pa'i le'u ste/
93a5(mdo): bcu kacig pa'o// / gzhonu ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad kyi / bo nyid shes pa de'i yon tan dang phan yon de lta bur 'gyur ro//
93a6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yang dag par smra'o// de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa ma yin pa dang // myed pas myi bsku ra to// de ci'i phyir zhe na// chos gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa
93a7(mdo): rab tu dbye ba'i chos nyid de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas par rab tu shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzho nu sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas te// bsam gyis myi khyab
93a8(mdo): cing bsas pa dang brus pas na de dag bsam pa'am dpag par gyi nus so// de ci'i bIr zhe na/ ga'o du gzungs kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzugs myed pa ste/ bstan du myed pa ste/ gnon de sna sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sangs
93a9(mdo): rgyas kyi yon tam shing ba nyid kyang de yin no// mangs rgyas kyi son ti kyi mi ba nyid dag payin pade bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi yi tan yang dmed do// de 'di da gshegs pa'i ngos nyid gang yin pa chom pas pa cad kyi tho'
93b1(mdo): kyang de yin te// gzho nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ka ga de ltar yon tan thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid don gcig tu bstan pa// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ni/ gzho nu byang chub sems dpa'
93b2(mdo): sems dpa' chen po yid kyis nges par brtags pa zhes bya ste// 'byung ba la mkhas shing khams gsum las byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ji lta ba bzhin du lta zhing log par myi smra// rnam pa gzhan
93b3(mdo): du kyi smra// ji skad smra ba de bzhin byed// khams gsum la ma chags shing khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das te// 'dod pa'i sa dang / gzugs kyi sa dang / gzugs myed pa'i sa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sa dang /
93b4(mdo): myong gi sa dang / sgra las las 'das shing yi ge dang chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ ye shes kyi bzad par bsgoms pa// brjod du myed pa'i chos rtogs pa// yi ge shes pa yi ge la mkhas pa// yi ge dang tshig rab tu dpe
93b5(mdo): ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ yi ge dang tshig rab tu dbye ba rgyas pa shes/ pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba rgyas pa shes pa la mkhas pa/
93b6(mdo): chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa la mkhas pa yin te// gtan la bab pa'i blo dang ldan zhing bdud sdig can dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis zil kyis myi non to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad
93b7(mdo): pa'i che// lha dang myi'i skye dgu sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa zhag zhig phrag dgu rtsa brgyad kyis bye ba brgya stong 'khyil pa'i gzungs dang / sgrib pa myed pa dang / chos rnam par mthong ba'i bzod pa so sor thob nas/ bcom
93b8(mdo): ldan 'das kyis de dag thams cad bskal pa grangs myed pa brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste// thams cad kyang mying ni tha dad / tshe'i tshad
93b9(mdo): ni gcig par sangs rgyas kyi zhing se sor bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes lung bstand to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// byang chub sems dpa' blo dang ldan pa ga // bla na/
94a1(mdo): myed pa'i byang chub rab tshol zhing // chos dang de bzhin don la mkhas pa de/ chos kyi ngo bo nyid la dpyod pa yin/ de dag ma yin pa'i tshig kyi sla// sangs rgyas yon tan bye brag me 'dra ba// rgyal ba rnams/
94a2(mdo): kyi chos ni de yin te// dpa' bo the tsom bral bas shi nad tu rig/ chos kun don gcig par ni rab shes te// mgo gcig tu ni stong pa nyid yin pas// de dag la ni tha dad gyur pa myed// don gcig la ni shi nad tu bslabs
94a3(mdo): pa yin// rtog pa myed cing rnam rtog myed pa dang // dmyigs pa myed par blo gros ldan pas shes// zad pa dang ni myi zad 'du shes kyang // ma lus par ni thams cad rab tu spangs// de ni chos sku myi'i seng ge la// stobs
94a4(mdo): bcu ldan pa gzugs su myi lta zhing // de ni phyin ci log kun rab spangs pas// mtshan rnams su yang blta bar yod myi 'gyur// chos rnams 'di dag bsam myi khyab// lam dang bral zhing rang bzhin zhi// de lta bur
94a5(mdo): ni rab shes na// rkang gnyis rtse bo sangs rgyas mthong // ji ltarabadag gi 'du shes rig/ de bzhin kun tu blo yang gtong // chos kun de'i rang bzhin te// rnam par dag pa nam mkha' bzhin/
94a6(mdo): yid kyang rnams kyang 'byung ba myed// chos rnams thams cad shes pas na// khams gsum las ni rnam par grol// de la smon lam 'debs pa myed// yang dag ji bzhin du ni mtho ba 'gyur zhing /
94a7(mdo): log tshig smra rnam pa gzhan gyi sma// de'i tshig dang brjod pa thams cad kyang // rgyal ba dag gi mthu yis 'byung bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i sa dang nyon mongs sa rnams dang // gzugs dang gzugs myed lam kyang shin tu
94a8(mdo): 'dal// chos rnams la ni yid kyang ma chags shing // rab tu dga' bas 'gro ba pa par myod// mying gi sa las 'das shing sgra yang shes// ngo bo nyid kyis gsog tu gyurd pa ste// ji srid tsam du yun ring brjod na yang // re
94a9(mdo): sa gnas par byed pa yod ma yin// 'du shes rab tu rgyu ba myed// lta ba log pa kun las bsal// blo yang shin tu gtan la bab// brtan pa nam mkha' 'dra bar spyod// gal te bdud bye ba khrag zhig rnams// de'i sems
94b1(mdo): dgug phyir 'ongs kyang // bdud rnams thams cad zis mnan te// de'i dbang du 'gro myi 'gyur// bdud kyi rgya mo rnam spangs te// tshul khrims yongs dag gdung ba byed// bsam gtan dag gi bdel mos// 'jig rted
94b2(mdo): stong par rab tu shes// 'jig rten phung por smras pa yang // de dag stong par rab tu rig/ skye ba myed cing 'gag myed pas// chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' bzhin// de dag bdag nyid gtong byed kyi// stobs bcu'i tshul
94b3(mdo): khrims thos kyi gtong // de ni tshul khrims la rol dpyin// gar smod par yang skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing du ngam par 'gro// sangs rgyas zhag zhig mang po mthong // mtho ris dag ni gyi 'dod de// smon lam rnams
94b4(mdo): ni yongs myi gtong // chos nyid dag ni de myod de// skad cig brtson 'grus nyams myi byed// phyogs bcu'i ni sangs rgyas kyis// de ni shin tu bstod pa yin// de phyir gzho nu ting 'dzin las// chos 'di dag ni rang /
94b5(mdo): thos nas// shes kyi khye ni nas spongs la// skye bo mngal chos rab ston// sangs rgyas yon tan yang ldan pa// rang 'byung 'gyur/ bar kar 'dod pas// dge ba 'di la rab bslabs na// stobs
94b6(mdo): bcu 'chang ba sangs rgyas 'gyur// ting nge 'dzind rjes su slob pa'i #le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzho nur gyu rad pa la bka'
94b7(mdo): su lad pa// de lta bas na gzho nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin da nges par bstand pa la mkhas par bya'o//
94b8(mdo): gzho nu de la ting nge 'dzin nges par bstand pa gang zhe na// gang chos thams cad kyi ji lta ba bzhin nyid dang // mnyam pa nyid myi mnyam pa myed pa dang / myi rtog pa rnam par myi rtog pa// rnam par ma sgrubs pa// kun nas slong
94b9(mdo): bamyed pa// skye ba myed pa 'gag pa myed pa/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang / kun rtog pa yongs su chad pa// sems kyi dmyigs pa myed pa/ yid la byed pa myed pa// rnam par rig pa yongs su chad pa/ 'dod chags
95a1(mdo): dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug yongs su chad pa// mtha' myed pa/ mthar yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ yid la byed pa yongs su chad pa/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa/ dran pa dang blo gros dang /
95a2(mdo): rtogs pa dang khrel yod pa dang / brtan pa dang cho ga dang spyod yul dang / nan tan gyi gnas su gyur pa/ nyon mongs pa myed pa'i sa zhi ba'i sa// spros pa thams cad yongs su chad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab
95a3(mdo): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ni// gzho nu ting 'dzind nges par bstan pa zhes bya ste// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin nges par
95a4(mdo): bstand pa 'di la/ gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin dang ma bral ba yin// sems 'khrul pa myed pa yin// snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing sems can dpag tu myed pa'i don byed pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
95a5(mdo): 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin mnyam/ myed pa'i sa// shi nad tu mthong dga' phra zhing zhi// 'du shes// thams cad bcom pa ste// de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya// rtog pa
95a6(mdo): myed cing rnam rtog myed// gzung ba myed cing bstan pa myed// sems kyang dmyigs pa myed pa ste// de phyir ting nge 'dzind ces bya// nam zhig mnyam par bzhag 'gyur te// chos kun la ni rlom sems myed/
95a7(mdo): rlom sems myed pa ji bzhin pa// de ni ting nge 'dzind ces bsgrags// chos ni rdul tsam yod myed de// rdul ces bya ba'ang yod ma yin// chos rnams dmyigs su myed pa ste// de phyir ting nge 'dzind ces bya// sems kyi
95a8(mdo): dmyigs pa myed pa yang // de ni rnam par rtog ces bya// chos de rnam par ma brtags pa// de ltar ting 'dzin shes par gyis// sgra'i sa don rnams rab bstand te// sgra de nyid kyang dngos po myed// sgra ni brag cha lta bu ste/
95a9(mdo): bar snang dag ni nam ka bzhin// chos 'di rnams ni myi gnas te// 'di dag la ni gnas kyi dmyigs// myi gnas pa ni gnas kyi sgrar// ngo bo nyid kyis mya rnyed do// 'gro zhing 'chi bor brjod pa yi// de lta bu'i 'gro ba myed//
95b1(mdo): 'gro ba myed pa'i 'gro ba'i sgras// ting nge 'dzidad du de phyir gsungs// mnyam bzhag ma yin de ni rlom sems brjod// mnyam bzhag 'di yang rlom sems gnyis pa ste/ rlom sems myed par byang chub rim par myong // dran
95b2(mdo): brlom sems myed pa byang chub mchog/ mnyam pa myi mnyam pa zhi ba sangs rgyas sa// zhi gnas lhag mthong mtshan myed 'di yin te// zhi ba sangs rgyas sa 'od bsten byas na// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la de brtson yin//
95b3(mdo): don kyi rnam par rig par 'jug pa la// mi ge dag gis 'jug par gyi nus te// sgra dbyangs thams cad rnam par spangs nas ni// mnyam par bzhag 'gyur de la rlom sems byed// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ce
95b4(mdo): 'dzind 'di// ji ltar bshad bzhin gnas shing brtson byed na/ gal te zhing 'di bskalang pas tshig gyur kyang // re mchog dbus su bzhugs pas skyes kyi tshig/ bskal pa brgya phrag mang por rab bsregs
95b5(mdo): kyang // nam ka sngon cad nam yang myi tshig bzhin// chos rnams nam/ mkha' mtshungs par rnam rig pas// de ni mye'i nang du yod myi tshig gal te sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'bar 'gyur la// 'bar ba 'di
95b6(mdo): dag zhi zhig ces// ting 'dzin gnas nas smon lam 'di btab na/ sa rnams zhig kyang de la 'gyur ba myed// pe'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyang mtha' yas 'gyur// nam mkhal la yang thogs pa myed par 'gro/
95b7(mdo): rjes su bstan bzhin ting 'dzin gnas pa ni// byang chub sems dpal yon tan 'di dag myong // skye zhing 'chi 'pho bde 'gyur yang // skye ba myed cing 'chi 'pho myed// gang gis de ltar nam rig pa// de la ting 'dzin rnyed kyi da//
95b8(mdo): 'che 'pho skye ba myed par ni// 'jig rten mgon pos rab tu bshad// de ltar 'jig rten mgon rig nas// de phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang rig/ 'jig rten gyis ni mgos shing // 'jig rten kos la myi chags te// lus kyi thogs pa/
95b9(mdo): myed par yang // sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar byed// zhing dag na mi 'jig rten 'dren// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu mthong // sangs rgyas zhing bshad pa// chos rnams de dag der yang nyan// de la myi shes yong myed de/
96a1(mdo): chos kyi dbyings kyang rab tu 'chang // chos kyi rnam pa rtag tu rig/ de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul// bskal dpa bye bam 'chad ston kyang // de'i spobs pa zad kyi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan pa
96a2(mdo): po// mkhas pa dag kyang stsa lad par byed// byang chub sems dpa' stsal pa ni// pad ma 'dab ma stong pa la// skyil mo krung bcas 'dug pa dag/ zhing nas zhing du 'gro bar byed// ting 'dzin zhi ba bsgoms nas ni//
96a3(mdo): gzungs dang mdo sde bzang po dang // mdo sde gzhan yang bye ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ston// sems can mang po bsam myi khyab// phyir myi ldog la 'god par byed// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ston kyang // spobs/
96a4(mdo): pa dag ni zad myi 'gyur// rin chen rnam par brgyad pa yi// khang pa rtsegs bzhugs dar 'gro ste// dri dang ldan pa'i me tog gis/ 'dren pa la yang mngon par 'thor// dri dang ldan pa'i phye mas kyang //
96a5(mdo): 'dren pa la ni rab tu 'thor// de dag thams cad byang chub phyir// / rgya che ba'i mchod pa byed// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa'i// yon tan dpag myed de dag ni// nam zhig nyon mongs myed 'gyur ba/
96a6(mdo): de dag rdzu 'phrul de dag thob// nyon mongs pa dag kyi skye zhing / dag pa dang ba 'od gsal ba// myi 'khrugs 'dus ma byas pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i pyod yul lo// rab tu zhi zhing nye bar zhi/
96a7(mdo): nyon mongs myed cing mya ngan bral// sros myed rnam par ma sros pa// sros pa dag las shind tu 'das// yi ge'i spyod pa myed pa ni// chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid de// dbyangs kyis rig par dka' bas na// de phyir
96a8(mdo): ting nge 'dzind ces bya// zad myi shes shing nye bar zhi// lhun gyis grub cing bstan myed pa// rnyog myed yang dag nyid kyi mtha'// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul lo// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi
96a9(mdo): bslab pa ste// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di bslabs nas// yon tan dag gi pha rol phyind// tshu rol dang ni pha rol myed// sngon mtha' rnam par ma brtags te// de phyir sangs rgyas de dag kun// yon tan dag gi pha rol/
96b1(mdo): dbyinang // 'od dang 'gro ba myed pa dang // spros myed spun gyis grub pa'i// chos kyi rang bzhin mkhyen nas ni// de dag de las pha rol phyin/ ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//
96b2(mdo): bam tsho// de nas su 'od gzho nur gyur bstan las yangs te/ zla gos phrag pa gcig tu ga' banas// pus mo g.yas pa'i lgangs la btsugs nas// bcom ldan 'das
96b3(mdo): gas pa de logs su thal so sbyar ba btud nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsosad to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
96b4(mdo): chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i ting nge 'dzin da bstan pa legs par bshad pa'ini ngo mtshar tro// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring por bslab pa 'di la
96b5(mdo): bslabs nas// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa ni// bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs so// bcom ldan
96b6(mdo): 'das kyis bka' maHla dpa// gzho nu de'i dus la ba' parashes na khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyisazla 'od gzho nur gyur dpal skabs bye nas bcom ldan 'das la
96b7(mdo): sum du tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bstod do// 'dod dang khro bas rtag tu zil non cing // sdug bsngal gtses pa'i sems can gzigs nas ni/ skye dku thar byed sangs rgyas gyur da cig ces// byang chub
96b8(mdo): phyi ni khyod kyis sems kyang bskyed// dpa' bos bskald pa bye ba mang kyang de// sbyin dang dus dang sems sdom rtag tu gnas// bzod dang tshul khrims de bzhin brtson 'grus des// sbyin pa dag kyang mtha' yas rgya che byin/
96b9(mdo): rka lag dang ni srog kyang rab tong zhing // khyod kyi yid la nam yang skyo byed de// kaser rdul de bzhin bu dang chung ma dang // chags byed gyur nas rgyal po'i srid kyang gtong // khyod kyi tshul khrims dri myed nam dag ste/
97a1(mdo): bdag nyid gtong zhing tshul khrims yongs myi 'dral// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rab tu bsdams// bde gshegs sems dul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bzod la dges shing bzod pa'i lam la gnas//
97a2(mdo): su ni dum bur byas kyang 'khrug myed de// byams pa bsgoms pas de la 'o ma gzags// bde gshegs ngo mtshar khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// stobs bcu dag ni stobs dang ldan gyurd cing // chags myed ye shes gnas pa
97a3(mdo): chos kun rtogs// thugs rjes 'jig rten phan mdzad chos kyi rje// skye dgu'i don bzhed zugs brtse ba// stong par mkhyend cing 'di na sems can myed// de bzhin 'jig rten lam stor gzigs nas ni// de dag rang
97a4(mdo): bzhin bdag myed chos rtogs bgyis// nam grol skyes kyang gang na'ang nas grol myed// so sor brtags te bag myed thams cad spangs// bdud sde mtha' yas stobs dang ldan pa bcom// ye shes mtha' yas byang chub
97a5(mdo): rgya cher mkhyenang // mchog tu nam dag zhi ba'i chos kyang ston/ zla ba skar mar bcas pa'i gnas ltung zhing // ri dang grong du bcasapa'i sa gnyis la// nam mkha'i khams ni rnam pa gzhan 'gyur
97a6(mdo): khyod ni myi bden pa'i tshig myi gsung // skye dgu dmyigs pa dag la dga' ba dang // sems can sdug bsngal khyod kyis gzigs nas ni// stong pa nyid dang zab cing zhi ba dang // dmyigs pa myed pa/
97a7(mdo): dag ni stond par mdzad// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// myi dmyigs pa'i bslab pa la// dpa' chen pos bslabs pas na// khyod la 'khrul pa yod myi mngal// ji lta bu'i chos bslabs pa// de lta bu'i chos
97a8(mdo): stond te// mu stegs gzhan dag 'i snyed dang // byis pa dag gis sa 'di kyin// bdag tu 'du zhes kang gnas pa// phyi mkhas de dag 'thum par 'gyur// chos rnams bdag byed rig pas na// thod la 'thus dpa
97a9(mdo): yod kyi mngal// dpa' bo chen po yang dag gsung // yang dag chos la rab tu gnas// mgon po yang dag bden gnas te// yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung // khyod kyis smon lam btab pa bzhin// khyod kyis gyod pa sa
97b1(mdo): dag 'byung // yang dag de'i rgyu 'dra bas// yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung // yang dag gyod pa phun sum tshogs// yang dag mthal la shin tu skabs// yang dag bsam pa yang dag gyod// yang dag mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo//
97b2(mdo): khyod kyi shes rab mnyam pa myed// ye shes gsung ba 'od mdzad pa// ye shes khyad par rab brnyes shing // ye shes gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis byams pa rab bsgoms te// sems can kun gyi bshes gnyen khyod// ri rab
97b3(mdo): bzhin du rtsi bskul te// mye g.yo rab tu gnas pa yaM// ston pa'i 'khor tshogs rgya che yang // tshogs mang dag kyang sdud pa mdzad// shes rab zab mo bde bar gshegs// 'khor gyi nang gshegs smra yang sgrog/ sangs
97b4(mdo): rgyas mong ge'i sgra smig cig// seng ge'i stabs su rnas par gshes sa// khyod kyis su stegs kun 'dul ba// seng ge'i sa ni 'arnams bzhin// dpa' bo la dul rdul mdzad ga// ma dul ba dag khyod kyis btul/
97b5(mdo): de dag mnga' sdug brtan 'gyur te// dbyer gyi byed cing legs pa/ gnas// lta ba sna tshogs gnas pa'i// sems cad sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni// stug dang kyi sdug byed pa yi// bdag myed
97b6(mdo): chos ni khyod ste dang te/ sa skabs pa'i byis pa dag/ sog pa khams spyod pa rnams// 'dren pa gang nas gshegs pa'i// layang rab tu khyod kyis bstan// bdag tu 'dzin pa su gnas pa/
97b7(mdo): de dag sug bsngal nyid la gnas// gang la sdug bsngal byed pa'i ga bdag byed de dag myigs so// 'bras pa byed pa'i chos chegacod ston // thod sa nas dpa kyi rnyed 'dzin rten sa nod// khyod ni ma sog pa'i
97b8(mdo): gsungs te// sdug bsngal yang thar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// lha klu gnod sbyar bye ba zag zhig zag/ brgya stong mang po mkhal la 'khod pa rnams// bcom ldan khyod kyi don ldan gsung thos nas// thams cad 'dren/
97b9(mdo): la rab tu dgal ba bskyed// tshig ni rab tu snyan cing babang la 'phang // mnyen zhiba'angs la yid 'ong dus dang 'byorade// gsung gi yam lag dpag tu myed dang ldan// phan byed skye 'i mang po zer byed pa// sil snyan pa
98a1(mdo): stong dpag tu byed pa dang // lha'i dbyangs skra dga' bar 'gyur ba'i mchog/ shinang tu snyan pa dus gcig 'byor gyur da kyang // bde gshegs gsung gcig gis ni zis kyis non// zhu byug bya mang 'jam pa/
98a2(mdo): sgra 'byid dang // ku la shin tu med 'phad dbyangs snyad dag/ bya tshogs yang po thams cad sgra 'byin pa// sangs rgyas gsung gi cham yang des kyi bod// lha'i bu mo sgra dbyangs snyan pa dang // sel snyan rol mo glu dbyangs 'ja
98a3(mdo): pa dang // pi babarda dzang chen bdungs pa'i sgra// de dag sangs rgyas gsung kyi char gyi bod// khu byug ne cor skyegs sgra rnams dang // khrung khrung ma bya myi 'am ci'i sgra// sgra dbyangs yid 'ong snyan pa ci yod pa// de dag sangs
98a4(mdo): rgyas de dag gsung gi char myi chod// snyan cing gnyen la yid long dga' ba dang // shin tu gnyen la rab sngags zhi ba'i tshig/ dbyangs rnams thams cad dus cig bsgrags pa bas// de bzhin gshegs
98a5(mdo): pa'i gsung mchog dkar 'gyur ni// lha myaM mya dbang lha ma yin nas dang // srid gsum sems can mtha' dag ci yod pa// 'od byed/ rnams kyi 'od snang de dag ni// bde gshegs 'od gzer gcig gi
98a6(mdo): zil kyis non// bde gshegs sku ni me tog rgyas pa bzhin// mtshan rnams kun gyis sna tshogs spras shing brgyan// bsod nams brgyas grub dag cing rnam par dang // rgyal ba'i sku ni 'jig rten kun tu
98a7(mdo): ldan// dung ki sgra dpa'ar rnga sgra snyan dang // rnga'i sgra dang de bzhin kam bi la'i sgra// rab tu 'jam zhing 'thad pa'i sgra de kun// sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi rgya yi char myi bong// sil snyan bye ba zhag zhig stong gi sgra// skra
98a8(mdo): skad gsang zhing mnyen la lha'i rnga// lha dang lha mo'i sgra dbyangs kar 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya'i char gyi phod// thung zhung ma bya dur ba 'u byug dang // ngang pa kun la nam yang bya'i tshogs// de dag smra brnyan
98a9(mdo): dus gcig tshogs pas kyang // sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya'i char gyi phod// klu dang gnod sbyin dang myin lto 'phye dang // lha dbang tshangs pa lha'i bdag po'i sgra// sid gsum yid 'ong 'thad pa ci yod pa// de dag
98b1(mdo): sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi char gyi phod// tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha'i dbang po dang // nyi ma dang ni nor bu rin chen 'od// kun gyi 'od ni rnam pa dum dag/ 'od kun rgyal ba'i 'od kyis zil gyis non// lus dpangag dang yid/
98b2(mdo): kyang shin tu rnam par dag/ ye shes dag pa srid pa gsum nadagos pa myed// myi dbang yon tan dbyig tshogs yon tan thams cad kyis ni mnyam myed mnyam// de ltar stobs bcu bden pa gsung la bstod nas ni//
98b3(mdo): gzho mu yid kyang rab tu dka' bas tshig smras pa// sangs rgyas gzhas byed dpagayas la ni mchod pa yis// shag kya thub bzhin bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyurd cig smra// bde bar gshegs pas de'i pyod pa mchod
98b4(mdo): mkhyen nas// kye dbang chags myed ye shes mnga' ba 'jum pa mdang // stobs bcu'i sras kyi byams pas de zhus te// 'dren pas gang gi/ slad du 'di ltar 'dzum pa mdzad// sa 'di dag kyang rnam pa drug tu
98b5(mdo): yongs su g.yos// lha dang klu rnams mkha' la 'dug cing rag/ dga' ste// shi nad tu sems rangs mgu bas sangs rgyas lta zhing // mchis// bde gshegs zil kyis ma non de dag lung bstan gsol
98b6(mdo): skyes bu mchog gi ye shes gapal bzhugs pa ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag gis ma lags// rgyal ba khyod kyis gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad pa// ye shes rnam dag dpel myed ye shes ma
98b7(mdo): lus gsungs// shag kya'i seng ge stobs bcu mnga' zhing nam 'dren pa// rkang gnyis mo bo ye shes kyi yang pha ros phyind// 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang ba ba kati mug sel// rab tu 'od snang mdzad pa khyod la zhugs
98b8(mdo): byang chub dam pa mchog 'dir rab tu tshol ba'i phyir// 'dren pas bskal pa'i gang 'ga'i bye snyed dang // de las lhag par yang ni khyad pa rab tu spyod// gang gi don tu 'dzum pa 'di 'dzad bstan du gsol// ye shes
98b9(mdo): dam pa mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir// ston pas phyag dang zhabs kyang yongs su btang ba mdzad// sras dang btsun mo mnyen bshes rka lag phangs pa dang // thub pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di'i rgyuHgag lags// rta dang ban glang
99a1(mdo): nadang nigag ga bang dang // bran dung nor bu chus dang sa cig cod kyis btang // spyod pa sachog kyang cin myod sa la 'atang nga// rin po me dang do sangs dag ni gang yang byed// srid gsum sa zhes pa/
99a2(mdo): ni mchog tu 'gyur// sems can thams cad kyi ni pyod pa rab tu mkhyed // sems dpa khams dang mos pa dag la'ang mkhas shing rig/ gang gi don tu 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan pa mdzad// mye'i tso bo la ni gang gis mchod
99a3(mdo): gang gi don ni rgya che yangs par 'gyur// myod pa 'di yang su yang rab tu 'dzin// thub pa kang gi don du 'dzum 'di bstan// sa yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// pad ma bye ba 'dab ma bye bar ldan// gser gyi pa
99a4(mdo): ma shin tu 'od gsal ba// mdzes shing yid du 'thad pas las byung // byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul rab che ba// rgyal ba'i thugs kyi sras po de la mchis// chos smra ba yang mang po 'dir mchis te// 'dren pa
99a5(mdo): la no de'i slad du zhu// rnga dang dung dang kha rnga smra tshan dang // sil snyan bye ba khrag theg brdungs pa la// de dag sgra ni nam mkhal 'di las 'da'// bde bar gshegs pa'i dbyad ni bsam myaM'
99a6(mdo): khyab// zhung chung ngang pa ka la bying ka dang // zhu byug bya tshe// sa mang po 'dus pa'i// sgra dbyangs rab tu snyan pa phyung ba yang / de dag sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi char gyi 'od// gang gis sbyin dang /
99a7(mdo): dus dang legs sdos rnams// sngon gyi ba bsnad pa mang mar bsnyen pa bgyis// gang gis kyi'i gatsho thong rab mayod na// su'i slad du 'dus pa 'di dag bstad// ros gus pa mchog kyang skyed das ni// sangs rgyas byung
99a8(mdo): sa 'gyu shes/ gang sa// su ma 'dus pa 'didag ba/ sa 'du ldan nga// du byung da pa ni pa dang/
99a9(mdo): ba bca byed// dbye byed du grumasags/ mag ma kun kyi sa sus lam pas dang// kyin la gang gi mas mi dza dang // sbe ma chu kya ma da/ gyi
99b1(mdo): zhu ba lags// rgyu dang rigs pa 'dul la mkhas pa dag/ sangs rgyas ye shes ji ltar thob snyam pa// spyod pa mchog la su dag pyod pa rnams// de phyir bdag ni rkang gnyis rtsol zhu// gang gis phra zhing shin tu blta dka
99b2(mdo): chos// stong pa zhib mtshungs myed bsas kyi khyab// stobs bcu ldan pa'i myod yul bsgoms pa rnams// de dag slad du 'dren pa bdag zhu'o// srog chags 'gro ba bsam yas kun gyi phyir// gang gis byams
99b3(mdo): pa'i snying rje rab bsgoms shing // kapa la sems can 'du shes myed pa dag/ de phyir rkang gnyis rtsol bdag zhu'o// gang dag ye shes mtshungs byed bsam kyi khyab// de dag la ni gzung ba yong byed de// sems dang /
99b4(mdo): spyod yul dag gi pha rol phyin// de phyir mgon po la ni bdag zhu'o// tshul khrims ye shes yon tan pha rol phyi nad// dus gsum la ni ye shes mtshungs myed 'jug// khyod la 'khrul pa dag ni myi mnga' na// su
99b5(mdo): slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan// sha ri'i bu dang ma 'gagasame'u 'gal bu// bad gshegs nyan thos gzhan kag su mchis/ pa// 'di la de dag ye shes myi 'jug ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas
99b6(mdo): gyod yul bran byed// chos rnams kun la dbang ba'i pha rol phyi nang // bslab pa'i spyod pa kun gyis mngon par 'phags/ 'dren 'thugs je dag kyang rab bskyed la// don dam mkhyed pa
99b7(mdo): gsung sgra 'byung bar gsos// sngon 'gag bskald pa bye ba yang por yang // skyabs dang dpung gnyen mchog tu 'gyur snyas ste// de 'dra'i sems kyis rkang gnyis gtso 'dris pa// 'dzin pas de'i 'bras bu deng gsungs
99b8(mdo): shig/ gang bag chen pos lung bstams nyan pa'i phyir// gnod sbyin srin po chul bum gsang ba'o// rkang gnyis cho bo la ni rab rtog cing // thams cad mal mo sbyar te gus par 'khod// sangs rgyas zhing di bye ba mang po rwa/
99b9(mdo): byang chub sems dpal 'phrul ldan mang po mchis// bde gshegs sras kyi gtso bor thugs las skyes// thams cad thal mo sbyar cing gus par 'a'od// shag kya seng ge myi mchog dri ba'i phyir// myi 'khrugs shing phyogs 'jig
100a1(mdo): rten nam grags pa// shar phyogs nas ni spos kyi glang po yang // byang chub sems dpal khrag khrig mdun bdar mchis// shag kya seng ge myi mchog dri ba'i phyir// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams mchog ca/
100a2(mdo): mthu chen thob dang myan ras gzigs dbang yang // byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig lhan cig mchis// gang dag sngan cad bskal pa bye mang snyed// ye shes dam pa mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir// rgya mtsho kun gyi bye ma mnyam
100a3(mdo): ba'i// bde gshegs dpag tu myed pa bsnyen bkur bgyis// sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod cing rab bsngags pa// chos rnams kun gyi yon tan pha rol phyi nad// 'jig rten phyogs rnams kun tu rab grags pa// 'jam/
100a4(mdo): dbyangs legs par thal mo sbyar te mchis// sangs rgyas zhing du khrag khrig s+yad bgyis kyang // 'di 'dra'i rnams ni mthong ba rnyed dka' ste// legs bslabs sangs rgyas sras po yon tan can// thams cad thal mo
100a5(mdo): rab sbyar gus par 'khod// ston pa kun gyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa// mkhas pa 'dir mchis ci 'dra de lta bu// snod du gyur pa/ 'di na gzhan ma mchis// 'dren pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs su brjod
100a6(mdo): pa gsungs// rgyal ba rnam 'dren gling bzhi ma mchis par/ gang zag dam pa 'dzum pa myi ston na// gang gi skad du 'dzum pa 'di bstand pa// rnga mchog sgra ldan gsung dbyangs 'byung du
100a7(mdo): gsol// rang ba'u byug rma bya sa ra sa// 'brug gi sgra skad khyu mchog sgra 'byin zhing // lha'i rol mo snyan pa'i sgrar 'byind pa// sems can sgrol mdzad gsung gis lung ston cig/ byams pa bskyed cing dga'
100a8(mdo): ba 'phel bar bgyid// ye shes stond cing ma rig se lad pa ste// don la rtog cing shes rab 'phel bgyid cing // bskal pa zhag zhig bye ba rnam sbyong ba// rtogs pas nges bgyis dngos po rnam par bshig/
100a9(mdo): sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i tshig dod nges par nyon// mu stegs kun gyi smra ba rnam par 'jom// stong pa srog myed sems can myed pa bsgom// bsod nams stong phrag brgya yis legs par brgyan// sangs rgyas
100b1(mdo): stong phrag brgya yis 'dir s+yad de// lha rnams stong phrag brgya yis rab tu bstod// tshangs pa stong phrag brgya yis phyag kyang bgyis// gnod sbyin srin po klul bum dang bgyid de// klu dang lto 'phye 'dab bzangs/
100b2(mdo): bar bgyid// rtag tu ma chags shin tu ldan pa ste// las dge'i 'bras bus 'phags pa gsung phyung shig/ rgyal ba ji snyed mya ngan 'das pa dang // gang dag ma byon pa dang bzhugs pa rnams// thams cad khyod kyis mnye
100b3(mdo): cing thogs myi mngal// 'dren pa yon tan kun gyis shin tu 'phags// 'byung po 'dzind pa ri dang rgya mtshor bcas// sa 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// lha'i tshogs rnams mkha' las me tog 'thor//
100b4(mdo): lha'i spos dang yid du 'ong ba ldang // 'dod chags zhe sdang rab rib a lus bsaHlang // tshul khrims yongs dag yid kyang yongs su dag/ mtshan myed rab tu zhi ba'i stong la dgyes// seng ge'i sgra skad sgrogs shing thugs rje
100b5(mdo): can// spos dang ldan zhing shin tu snyan pa yangs// rgyal ba'in sa rab rdzogs shing ye shes rdzogs// thugs rje ldan pa khyod 'dra/ 'jig rten byed// gang gi don tu 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsungs
100b6(mdo): ma bya 'u thug ka la bying ka'i sgra// shang shang te'u ya~M sgra yang med 'ong ba// dka' 'gyur skad kun dus cig tshogs pas kyang // 'dre gshegs gsung gi cher ni des kyi 'od// dza dang rdza dzakhar bde ba'i
100b7(mdo): te// dung dang gling bu de bzhin pi bang dang // sil snyan stong gi sgra rnams gcig tu 'dus// de dag bde gshegs sgra'i char myi phod// lha'i sil snyan dam pa stong gi sgra// lha'i bu mo glu dbyangs snyan pa dang // rol mo'i
100b8(mdo): smra rnams dgal ba bskyed bgyid pa// de dag bde gshegs gsung gi char gyi phong// 'jig rten phan pa khyod kyi gsung gcig las// mos pa tha dad bzhin du sgra 'byung ste// rgyal ba bdag la ston snyam so so sems/
100b9(mdo): gang gi slad du khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad ston// lha'i sgra dang de bzhin klu'i skad// myi'am ci'i sgra snyan ci mchis pa// de dag nam yang nyon mongs ni myi bgyid// sangs rgyas gsung ni rtag tu nyon mongs sel// dka'
101a1(mdo): tsa2// bskyed cing 'dod chags dag la ma lags// byams pa bskyed cing zhe sdang blo ma lags// shes rab skyed cing ga ti muka blo ma lags// sangs rgyas gsung ni dri ma thams cad sel// 'khor las slad rol
101a2(mdo): du ni sgra myi 'byung // thams cad kyi yang nem nur brgya mang gcod// mtho ba ma lags dma' ba ma lags pa// thob pa'i gsung ni snyoms shing bde ba ston// r-i dang dgas bcas sa 'di kas gyurd cing // rgya mtsho'i chu
101a3(mdo): ngag de bzhin pas gyur da la// zla bo nyi ma sa la lhung 'gyur da kyang // rgyas pas bshad pa rnam pa gzhan myi 'gyur// tshig gi yan lag thams cad dag pa'i gsung // seng ge'i sgra skad 'jam zhing mnyen pa'i dbyangs//
101a4(mdo): tshangs po'i dbyangs mngal bde gshegs thugs rje can// gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad bstan tu gsol// 'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi/ 'jig rten sems can ji snyed kun gyi yang // sems dang pyod pa
101a5(mdo): kun la rab tu mkhas// gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol// rgyal ba ji snyed su dag zugs rje can// dbang dang ye shes kun gyi// pha rol phyin// dri myed zla zhal rgyal ba de dag ni// rtag tu
101a6(mdo): rgyu myed 'dzum pa myi mdzad do// bskas pa bye bar brjod kyang mtshungs myed pa// gang ga'i bye snyed yon tan brjod bkyis kyang // yon tan dag gi tshad brjod myi nus pa// gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan
101a7(mdo): bshad du gsol// 'dzum pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
101a8(mdo): 'di dag gis slar bka' saHla pa// zla 'od gzho nur gyur pa 'di nyid kyis mtshungs pa myed pa'i dga' bas sangs rgyas bstod// sangs rgyas yon tan bye brag 'phags brjod pas// rtag tu 'khor mor shin tu bsdu/
101a9(mdo): par 'gyur// sngon yang rgyal po khab kyi grong khyer 'dir // sangs rgyas dag kyang bye ba phrag stong mthong // rgyal ba de dag kun gyi drung du 'dis// ting 'dzin da zhi mchog 'di yang rab tu dris// byang chub pyod pa mchog 'di
101b1(mdo): spyod pa na// 'di ni kun tu pa'i bur 'gyur te// thams cad du yang spobs dang ldan par gyur // kun tu rtag par tshangs par pyod pa kyang // de ni phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po la// 'di lam pas khyod nyid pa'i dbang // rtag
101b2(mdo): tu tshangs spyod gnas nas ni// ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyas byed 'gyur// ting 'dzind dam pa 'di ni rab tshol zhing // lam 'dir zhugs pas byang chub des 'thob 'gyur// sangs rgyas bye ba mang pos yongs bzung ste// 'dren
101b3(mdo): nams la mchod pa mchog byed 'gyur// ngani ye shes la yang rab gnas te// zla 'od myong pa khyod zhugs lung bstand cing // 'di'i mog dang tshangs par gyod pa dag/ phyi la'i dus la bar chad byed par bya// las
101b4(mdo): 'phel sgyu ru 'bru lnga bkod pa bzhin// ma 'ongs pa na gapa la mchod 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas bye ba dag ni phrag stong dang // de las lhag par gang ka'i bye snyed shes// lha dang klu rnams bye ba brgyad cu dang // gnod
101b5(mdo): sbyin bye ba stong phrag bdun bcu dag/ phyi ma'i dus la brtson par/ byed par 'gyur// rkang gnyis gtso bo la yang mchod pa byed// rkang gnyis mo la mchod pa mchog byas te// ye shes bla myed
101b6(mdo): 'di di rab bsgrubs nas// kyai dus lus la de ni 'jig rten mgon// rgyal ba'i dri khyed 'od ces bya bar 'gyur// zla 'od gzho dur gyur bas bdag nyid kyi// lung bstan 'di thos dka' bas rgyas
101b7(mdo): 'gyur te// ta sa bdun srid du ni mngon 'phags nas// mkha' la 'dug ste ched du brjod pa brjod// e ma rgyal ba chos mchog ston mdzad pa// nam grol ye shes bdag po stobs la gnas// shin tu nges pa'i ye shes
101b8(mdo): mchog gnas pas// pha rol rgol pa dag gis zil gyi nod// chags pa spangs shing rnam par grol la reg/ dngos po nas bshig srid par chags kyi mdzad // khyod la thos pa mtha' dag kun gyi mnga'// srid pa kasu
101b9(mdo): la chags myed ye shes 'jug/ spros pa thams cad kyis kyang kyi gos shing // lta ba sros pa mtha' dag rab tu spangs// lam yang shin tu bsgoms shing gnas myed pa// zis gyis ma non su dang myi 'phrod myed// khyod ni
102a1(mdo): khams gsum dag la gnas byed de// chu bo dang ni mdud pa thams cad spangs// srid pa'i khri shing 'ching ba mtha' dag paH// srid pa spangs shing srid par mtshams sbyor byed// chos kyi rang bzhin dngos byed/
102a2(mdo): rab mkhyend cing // brjod du myed pa'i tshig kyang thugs su chung // mu stegs phyin ci log la gnas pa dag/ myi mkhas de kun seng ges wa bzhin bshig// bde bar gshegs pas bstend pa'i chos kyi gter// gter mtsho
102a3(mdo): dam pa bdag gis deng thob ste// ngan 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad spangs// 'dren par myi 'gyur snyam pa ni the tsom myed// gser gi kha dog mdzes shing 'od gsal ba// phyag brkyang de'i mgo la rab bzhag nas/
102a4(mdo): lhar bcas 'jig rten dag kyang dbang bkod de// mye'o khyu mchog bya ba rgyab dbang bskur mdzad// 'dzum pa lung bstand pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan
102a5(mdo): 'das kyis zla 'od gzho nur gyur pa la bka' saHlad pa// gzho nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las tha rad
102a6(mdo): par bya bar 'dod pas dang // ting nge 'dzind kyi dga' zhing bde ba bla na myed pa 'phags pa 'di yang // sems can rnams rab tu dgod par 'dod pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par
102a7(mdo): thos pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya// gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya// bcang bar bya/ klag par bya// rab tu 'don par bya/ sung mnod par bya// kha ton bya// nyon mongs pa myed pa'i bsgom pas/
102a8(mdo): bsgom par bya// mang du bya// gzhan skang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstand par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzho nu chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi rgyas po 'di ni ngan song
102a9(mdo): thams cad las 'da' bar byed pa// nad thams cad las rab tu tha rad par byed pa yin te// gzho nu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par sros pa// ting po 'dzind kyi rgyal
102b1(mdo): po 'di zos shing bzung ste/ sgoms par gyur pa de'i tshe// gzho nu byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las tha rad par byas shing / ting nge 'dzind kyi dag
102b2(mdo): ba'i 'de ba bla na byed pa 'phags pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzind 'di yang myur du 'thob po// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas dang /
102b3(mdo): tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzho nur gyur pa la don 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir// tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis sdom byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di yang dag par rab tu bshang ngo // sngan cad gyod pa khyad pa dran pa ni/
102b4(mdo): bde gshegs seng ge rgyal mtshan bstan pa la// dge slong mkhas pa chos smra byung ba yang // de'i phyi ni tshangs pas byin zhes bya// pan blo gros zhes bya rgyal po'i bu// na bar gyurd te myi bzang sdug bsngal
102b5(mdo): chor// de tshe tshangs pas byin la chos smra ba// nga yi slob do / na du ni gyurd pa yin// pa yi smad pa lnga brgya myi nyung ba// brtson pa'i yid kyis nang dpyad gso bar byed// po'i nad ni gso
102b6(mdo): ma nus nas// po'i mnyen bshes kun kyang sdug bsngal gyur // nga yang na bar dge slong des thos nas// nad 'dri bar ni po'i drung du 'ongs// tshangs byin pas brtse ba ba bskyed nas/
102b7(mdo): tipa 'dzin mchog 'di de tshe bshad par gyur // nga ni ting 'dzind ngam pa 'di zos nas// 'phags pa'i dka' ba zang zang myed pa skyes// chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab shes pas// yang de'i dus na nad las sos// mar/
102b8(mdo): me mdzad de khyad par pyod pa na// dge slong chos smra mkhas par gyur pa yin// nga ni blo gros rgyal po'i bur gyur da te// ting nge 'dzin da ye shes kyis ni nad las tha rad// de bas gzho nu khyod kyis phyi dus na// yongs
102b9(mdo): su nyams pa 'di dag rjes dran zhing // byis pas nyes par brjod pa'i tshig brjod kyis// ting 'dzin 'di yang bzung la legs par lhogs// phye mo'i dus la dge slong mang po dag/ brkam zhing bcum la ma bsdams
103a1(mdo): 'byung bar 'gyur// sdig la dka' zhing lhung gzed chos gos chags// ting 'dzin da 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur// rgod cing dbang po g.yengs pa phra dog can// gro pa la chags shing rnyed pa 'dod pa dag/
103a2(mdo): sbyor bar byed pa'i skabs la rtag tu gnas// ting 'dzind 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur// lag pa dang ni rkang par rnam par rdob// rtse 'jo dgod la rtag par rab tu zhugs// gcig la gcig ni mgul khyud lag kyang sbrel/
103a3(mdo): grong du myod lam gzhan du bsgyur bar byed// myi rigs sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid 'di dag ste// gzhan gyi bu mo la yang rtag tu chags// gzugs kyi rgyags shing mdud pa bor ba yin// grong dang grong khyer yul 'khor kun tu rgyu
103a4(mdo): de dag bza' dang btu la rab tu zhugs// klu dang bro gar de bzhin rol mo dang // nyo tsheng lhag par byed cing rtag tu brtson// btung ba dag la chags shing dro tsha bor// myi rigs brtson pa spring yig skur bar byed// tshul
103a5(mdo): khrims de bzhin spyod lam btang nas ni// khyim pa dag dang sten cing khrims dral nas// de dag tshul zhig log par shin tu gnas// las kag/ sangs rgyas kyis ni rtag spad pa// srang dang tshadas
103a6(mdo): g.yo sgyu byed par zhugs// de 'dra sdig pa nyon mongs las byasapas// las ngan byed pa de dag ngan song 'gro// dung dang gser dang nor bu mang ba dang // khyim dang mnyen bshes rnam spangs
