123a8(mdo): kye char 'bebs 'gyur// gzho nu khye'u mchog gnyis po byung ba yang // gzhan yin snyam na de ltar myi blta ste// mar me mdzad ni de na gcig tu gyurd// de tshe chos smra gnyis po pa yin no// gang gis rjes su 'thun pa'i chos thos pa
123a9(mdo): rgyal po der yang byams pa de tshe gyur // lha mo phan 'dod mkhas pa gang gyur pa// gzho nu khyod nyid de che der gyur to// rgyal po de'i nu bo gang byung ba// dge slong chos smra 'di gnyis sod cig ces// dge slong rnyed pa 'dod pas spar

123b4(mdo): rags pa rnams sa ni zan byed pas dan pa rdzogs pa'i cu kyang byed par gyi ba'ang // ting nge 'dzin 'di lta ci sgom// cu de ska bas dasus dang brag sa sangs chags par bya'i zhes de sa

123b6(mdo): tu sdig pa byed// su dag snying po myed pa'i sus srog la// lhag par chags pa yod pa ma yin pa// de dag gis ni bdud kyi sde bcom ste// byang chub shing drung byang chub rab tu rtogs// su dag bdag myed stong pa'i lus

123b8(mdo): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khwa 'od gzho nur gyur da pal bka' baHsa dpa// gzho nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang // myur du bla na myed pa yang
123b9(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi skur gyi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba yin te/
124a1(mdo): 6/ gzugs kyi skus rab tu bye ba yin no// gzhoru de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la smon par 'dod pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku shes par 'dod pas ti rje
124a2(mdo): 'dzin da 'di gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya// rab tu 'don par bya// lung mnod cing kha ton du bya// bsgom par bya// bsgom pa'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par bya// gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan

124a6(mdo): smon par 'dod pa rnams kyi sgra las shin tu 'das pa'i snying po ste/ 'dod chags las yang dag par 'das pa/ dbyer myi phyed pa ste/ zhe sdang las yang dag par 'das pa brtan pa ste/ gti mug las yang dag par
124a7(mdo): 'das pa/ stong pa nyid du bstan pas nges par bstan pa/ ma skyes pa skye ba las yang dag par 'das pa/ tha snyad du rtag pa/ mya ngan las 'das pas bye brag phyed pa/ sgras mya ngan las 'das pa dbyangs kyis zhi ba/ brdas
124a8(mdo): mtshungs par gyur pa/ don dam pas brdar gyur pa/ yang dag pa'i ji lta ba'i tshig gis dod dam pa yongs su gdung ba myed pas bsal la// gnas myed pa gzhas du myed pa/ kha dog bstan pas mu myed pa/ mngon par shes
124a9(mdo): pa chen po yongs su sbyang ba las byung ba ste/ gzho nu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// 'di 'dra'i 'i 'jig rten mgon po'i sku// su dag
124b1(mdo): shes par 'dod pa ni// ting 'dzin 'di de bskol gyis dang // sangs rgyas sku ni shes par 'gyur// sangs rgyas sku ni dag pa ste// bsod nams brgya sbyid 'od kyang gsal// de ni bar snang mtshungs pa ste/ de la tha dang
124b2(mdo): ba myed// sangs rgyas byang chub ce 'dra ba// mtshad rnams kyang ni de 'dra ste// de'i mtshan rnams mi 'dra ba// de'i sku ya pad 'dra'o// sku ni byang chub mtshan nyid de// sangs rgyas zhing yang 'dra zhing // stobs dang rnam
124b3(mdo): zar bsam gtan yang // de dag thams cad mtshan nyid gcig/ de ltar sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur te// 'jig rten mgon po'i de 'dra bas// sus kyang sha'i myig gis ni// nam yang mthong bar myi nus so// mang
124b4(mdo): po dag kyang 'di skad smra// ngas ni 'jig rten 'dren pa mthong // sku yang gser gyi kha dog la// 'jig rten thams cad sdang bar mdzad// sangs rgyas dag gi byin rlabs dang / mthu dang rnam par skul pa yis/
124b5(mdo): de ltar mtshan gyis smras pa yis// sku dag shin tu snang ba yin// bong chod zhun dang sboms su yang // sangs rgyas sku ni bshad mod kyi// sku'i tshad ni ma rnyed de// de phyir bsam gyis kyi khyab po// sangs
124b6(mdo): rgyas sku ni 'di tsam zhes/ gal te tshad kyang rnyed gyur dan// swA dang/ dang ni gyi rnams dang // ston pa bye brag myed par 'gyur// mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis ni// rnam par sbyin pa yang de'i mtshan//
124b7(mdo): mying dang gzugs kyang de 'drar mtshan// rnam par dag cing 'od gsal 'gyur// ji ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis// bskald pa bye bar bsten pa ltar// sus kyang ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di// nam yang goms par ma byas so//
124b8(mdo): dkar po'i chos ni mang po yis// ting 'dzin 'di ni bskyed pa ste// ting 'dzin 'di ni rgya che bas// nga yi lus kyang myi snang ngo // gang gi sems ni ci 'dra ba// mying dang gzugs kyang de 'dra ste// rang bzhin myed pa'i sa
124b9(mdo): kyi ni/ mying dang gzugs kyang mtshan de 'dra// mying dang gzugs la gang gi ni// 'du shes rags pa 'jug pa yang // bskal pa myi mnyam 'du shes kyis// rags pa'i sems kyang skye bar 'gyur// mying dang gzugs la u
125a1(mdo): pa gi// 'dushes tha mo 'dun 'di// cing dang gzugs la ma chags pas// sems ni rab tu 'od gsal 'gyur// ngas rngan ldan rgya ma rabs ni// mangs myed pa dag bdun phus pa// sngag pas
125a2(mdo): 'du shes gsum po dag/ nam yang skyes par ma gyurd to// nga yi sems ni zag myed de// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang // pa yi lus ni phyi snang ngo // ji ltar gang gi dngos po
125a3(mdo): las// yid kyang rnam par grol gyurd pa// de dag de yi dngos po dang // phyir yang phrad par myi 'gyur ro// dngos po kun las rnam pa kun// nga yi rnam shes rnam grol te// sems kyi rang bzhin shes pas na// phyir yang ye ske
125a4(mdo): 'byung bar 'gyur// zhing rnams bye ba phrag stong du// nga yi srul pa dang / kyang 'gro// sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed// de la lus kyang rnyed myi 'gyur// mtshan nyid myed cing mtshan ma myed// ji ltar nas
125a5(mdo): mkha' de bzhin du// nga yi sku yang brjod myed cing // shes par dka'/ pa rab tu bstan// dpa' bo chen po chos kyi sku// sku ni chos las skyes pa ste// gzugs kyi skur ni nam du yang // rgyal ba gdags
125a6(mdo): par yod myi nus// ji ltar bshad pa de dag kyang // thos nas dka' bar 'gyur ba ni// de la sdig can bdud kyis kyang // glan ka rnyed par myi 'argyu ra ro// zab mo'i ni chos thos nas// de la skrag pa myi 'byung ste//
125a7(mdo): de ni srog gi phyir nu yang // sangs rgyas byang chub spong kyi byed// mdo sde bye ba zag stong gi// yang dag bstan pa shes par 'gyur// gang dang gang tu song bar yang // 'jig rten dgas snang bar 'gyur// gno du de la de bzhin
125a8(mdo): gshegs pa'i sku ni mtshan ma dang // las kyis kyang shes par sla ba ma yin te// sngon po 'am kha dog sngon po 'am// sngon po lta bur ston pa 'am/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba 'am// ser po 'am/ 'dog ser po 'am// ser mo
125a9(mdo): wA bur stod dpa'am// 'od ser po 'byung ba 'am/ dmar mo 'am/ kha dog dmar po 'am/ dam ma po lta bur ston pa 'am// 'od dmar po 'byung ba 'am/ dkar po 'am// 'dog dkar po 'am// dkar po lta bur ston pa'o//
125b1(mdo): xxx
125b2(mdo): bya 'am/ byam 'dog gas/ rjes zung rtsod pa ma/ kye'i 'od 'byung ba 'am// mar gyi snying po 'am// mar gyi 'don gas// mams bur ston pa'am// mar gyi 'od 'byung ba 'am/ gser ram/ gam sa
125b3(mdo): dog gas/ gas gi 'dog sbu zur ston pa'am// gser gi 'od 'thung ba 'as// khye ru ru dang / bye ru rgya'i 'dog gas// kye durtsas bum stod pa'am/ bye du rgya'i 'od 'byung ba'am/ klog gas/ klog gi 'dog gas/ blos
125b4(mdo): bur stond pa 'am/ klog gi 'od 'byung ba 'am/ tshangs pa 'am/ tshangs pa'i kha dog kam/ tshangs pa lta bur ston pa'am// tshangs pa'i 'od 'byung ba 'am// lha 'am lha'i kha dog gam/ lha lta bur ston pa 'am/ lha li 'od
125b5(mdo): 'byung ba'o zhes shes par sla ba ma yin no// gzho nu de ltar de bzhin ka/ shegs pa'i sku ni dag pa ste// mtshan ma dag gis bsam par bya ba ma yin pa// bsam gyis myi khyab par bstand pa// mtshan
125b6(mdo): ma thams cad kyis kyang bsam par bya ba ma yin pa/ bsam gyis mye khyab par bstand pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad bsam gyis myi rgyab cing dpag tu myed pa zhes bya ba ma gtogs par/ lha dang bcas/
125b7(mdo): pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang gzugs kyi sku yongs su rdzogs las sku'i chad gzung bar sla ba ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// 'jig rten khams kyi rdul phran dang / rdul
125b8(mdo): du kying yang stond pa dang / ma tshe'u ba dang steng ka dang / rgya mtshon yang ji snyed du// ji snyed nus phran yod do zhes// de dag sa ni mtha' gyi rnyed// rgyam chos ni sgra ce yis// chu legs gzhas par nus kyang ni// 'jig rten
125b9(mdo): mgon po'i dpa' nyid du// yang dag bstand par gyi rung ngo // chu'i thigs pa dpag myed cing // de bzhin rab tu phra ba'i rdul// de bas sems can gcig gi yang // shind tu mang du ngas mthong ste// mos pa dang ni sems
126a1(mdo): bskyed pa// du ma dag ni shes myi sla// ngas ni sku'i yon tan dag// yang dag pa ni gang bstand pa// sems can kun gyi mos pa yang // de dag dpe ru bzod myi 'gyur// mtshan ma dang ni las rnams dang //
126a2(mdo): 'dog snang ba 'di 'dra zhes// sangs rgyas kyi ni shes myi nus// po yi bye brag de 'dra'o// sangs rgyas mtshan ma bral ba ste// chos kyi sku yis rab tu phye// zab cing dpag tu myed pa ste/ de phyir sangs rgyas bsam myi khyab/
126a3(mdo): sangs rgyas bsam du myed pa dang // sangs rgyas sku yang bsam du byed// sku de bsam du myed pa yi// chos kyi sku yis rab tu phye// sangs rgyas sku ni sems kyis kyang // bsam par bzod pa ma yin te// de ltar de'i skus/
126a4(mdo): yang // tshad kyang nye bar myi dmyigs so// chos rnams de dag dpag tu byed// bskal pa bye bar bsnyen pas na// de phyir nga yi lus kyang ni// 'od gsal bsam du myed pa grub// sems can kun kyis gzung du/
126a5(mdo): myed// tshad kyis// gzung bya ma yin te// de ltar sangs rgyas sku// dag ni// tshad myed bsam gyis myi khyab pa// tshad myed pa'i chos / dag gis// de la tshad ni brtag tu myed// ma brtags pa'i chos
126a6(mdo): dag gis// de ltar sangs rgyas ma brtags so// rtog pa dag na tshad du bstan// rtog pa myed pa tshad myed yin// myi rtog rtog dang bral bas na// de phyir sangs rgyas bsam du myed// ji ltar nam
126a7(mdo): mkha' tshad myed la// sus kyang gzhal du myi nus pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas sku dag kyang // nam mkha' nyid dang 'dra zhing mtshungs// sangs rgyas sku ni de lta bur// gang gis rig pa rgyal ba'i sras// de dag bsam gyis
126a8(mdo): myi khyab pa// sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//
126a9(mdo): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tha 'od gzho nur gyur pa la bka' saHsad pa// gzho nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po gang ci nas bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mngon gsum du bya bar 'dod de//
126b1(mdo): bzhi gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mngon sum du bya'o snyam na/
126b2(mdo): gzho nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ting nge 'dzind 'di gzung bar bya// kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ rab tu 'don par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton tu bya// nyon mongs pa myed pas bsgom pas
126b3(mdo): bsgom par bya// gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu bstand par bya/ bsgoms pas rnal 'byor da la rjes su brtson par bya'o// gzho nu da la chos so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gzho nu gzugs su brjod pa ji snyed yod pa dang /
126b4(mdo): gzho nu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yang de snyed do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams ji snyed pa dang / g.yo nu rnam par shes pa'i brjod pa ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa brjod pa yang /
126b5(mdo): de snyed do// gzho mu de ltar gzugs su brjod pa mtha' yas su myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngag/ pa brjod pa yang bsam gyis kyi khyab pa ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
126b6(mdo): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gzho mu 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i brjod pa mtha' yas su myed de// bsam gyis kyi khyab pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yang bsam gyis rgya
126b7(mdo): khyab po// gzho nu de ltar 'dus byas la yang nyes pa grangs myed/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yang phan yon grangs myed de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa grangs myed do// gzho nu 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i myi ji snyed
126b8(mdo): sod la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa'ang de snyed do// gzho nu 'di ltar mya ngan las/ 'das pa'i mying grangs myed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa yang grangs myed do// gzho nu 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa
126b9(mdo): brjod pa bsam gyis myi khyab par brjod pa ste/ de dag mthar phyind pa'i gnas su bstand par sla ba ni ma yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'du byed brjod pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / dbyangs brjod pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa
127a1(mdo): dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa brjod pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba brjod pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa ste/ gzho nu de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa bsam
127a2(mdo): kyis myi khyab par brjod pa bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i brjod pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa bsam kyis myi khyab par bstand pa ste/ de dag ni mthar phyi nad pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ma yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/
127a3(mdo): bzhi po de dag nyid de/ de bzhin du rgyas par bstand par bya'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi tshul bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshul bsam gyis
127a4(mdo): myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshul bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i tshul bsam gyis myi khyab pa 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang
127a5(mdo): zhe na/ 'du byed kyi rigs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed/ yongs su bshad pa'i rigs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas/ nyon mongs pa'i rigs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang
127a6(mdo): ba'i rigs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo bzhi ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi sgo bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad
127a7(mdo): pa'i sgo bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i sgo bsam gyis myi khyab pa 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges par bstan pa bzhi
127a8(mdo): ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed nges par bstan pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i nges par bstand pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa nges par bstand pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang /
127a9(mdo): rnam par byang ba nges par bstand pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgra bzhi ste/ bzhigang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi sgra bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad/
127b1(mdo): pa'i sgra bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgra bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i sgra bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi
127b2(mdo): gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshig bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa
127b3(mdo): dang / 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi tshig gi lam bzhi ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi tshig gi lam bsam gis kyi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis kyi/
127b4(mdo): khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig ki lam bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis myi khyal pa dpa' de bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
127b5(mdo): kyi dgongs te bshad pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi dgod sa te bshad pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon
127b6(mdo): mongs pa'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dpa' di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lha la nges par rtog pa bzhi ste/
127b7(mdo): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed lha la rtog pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa lha la rtog pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa lha la rtog pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang
127b8(mdo): bstsa la rtog pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi myi la rtog pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed myi la rtog pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su
127b9(mdo): bshad pa myi la rtog pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi la rtog pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba myi la rtog pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dnga'adi bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub
128a1(mdo): sems dpa' rnams kyi mying la rtog pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi ngas rtog pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mying la rtog pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon
128a2(mdo): mongs pa'i mying la rtog pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i mying la rtog pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jug pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
128a3(mdo): 'du byed la 'jug pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa la 'jug pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa la 'jug pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba la gyi rtog pa bsam
128a4(mdo): gyis myi khyab pa dnga'adi bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrol ba bzhi ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi sgrol ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgrol
128a5(mdo): ba bsam kyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrol pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i sgrol ba bsam/ gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems
128a6(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi rdo rje'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
128a7(mdo): rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mya khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam kyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi la// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig bzhi ste// bzhi ga zhe na/ 'du byed gsang
128a8(mdo): sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / kun nus nyon mongs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i gas pa
128a9(mdo): sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsgrub pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed bsgrub pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa bskub
128b1(mdo): pa bsam kyis kyi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa bsgrub pa bsam kyis kyi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba bsgrub pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang 'di ba'i'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdo sde
128b2(mdo): 'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang /
128b3(mdo): rnam par byang ba'i mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mya khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btags pa'i chos bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang
128b4(mdo): 'du byed yongs su bshad pa btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i btags pa'i tshig bsamo gyis myi khyab pa dang
128b5(mdo): 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi// tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis// myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis/
128b6(mdo): myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dpa' di bzhi la// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
128b7(mdo): gsal ba'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis
128b8(mdo): myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi spyod pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis
128b9(mdo): myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa spyod pa'i tshig bsam byas myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dpa'adi bzhi'o//
129a1(mdo): gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pyad pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhagang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa' pyad pa'i tshig bsam kyis myi
129a2(mdo): khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mya khyab pa dang / 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gyis myi khyab
129a3(mdo): pa'i tshig bzhi ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i tshig bsam kyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa bsam gyis
129a4(mdo): myi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mya khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtha' yas pa'i tshig bzhi
129a5(mdo): ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mtha' yas pa'i chi// ga bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa mtha' yas
129a6(mdo): pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu ba myed pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi
129a7(mdo): gang zhe na/ 'du byed rgyub myed pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa rgyu ba myed pa'i tshig bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa sgru ba myed pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang /
129a8(mdo): rnam par byang ba rgyab myed pa'i tshig bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mu myed pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi ga zhe na/ 'du byed su byed pa'i tshig bsam gyis skye
129a9(mdo): pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mu myed pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa u myed pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mu myed pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di ba'i
129b1(mdo): 'o// gno su 'di dag ni bya chub sems dpal rnams kyi gnas du rtsed pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhes/ 'du byed gzhas du med pa'i tshig bsam kyis kyi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gzhal du byed pa'i cig/
129b2(mdo): bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa gzhal du myed pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba gzhal du myed pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems
129b3(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi grangs myed pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed grangs myed pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa grangs myed pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
129b4(mdo): pa grangs myed pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba grangs myed pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa 'di bzhi'o// gzhonu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpag tu myed pa'i tshig bzhi
129b5(mdo): ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed dpag tu myed pa'i tshig bsam gyis/ myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa dpag tu myed pa'i tshig/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dpag tu myed pa/
129b6(mdo): 'tshig bsam gyis mya khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba dpag tu myed pa'i tshig bsam kyis myi khyab pa dang / 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshad myed pa'i tshig bzhi ste/
129b7(mdo): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed tshad byed pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshad myed pa'i rig bsam kyis kyi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa 'ang myed pa'i tshig bsam kyis myi khyab pa dang /
129b8(mdo): rnam par byang ba tshad myed pa'i tshig bsam gyis kyi khyab pa 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed
129b9(mdo): yongs su bsad pa shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'did/
130a1(mdo): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pas bsags pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i shes pa bsags pa
130a2(mdo): bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dang
130a3(mdo): rnams kyi shes pa'i rigs bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi shes pa'i rigs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa shes pa'i rigs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa shes
130a4(mdo): pa'i rigs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa'i rigs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'odi dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa bsags pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
130a5(mdo): 'du byed spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spobs pa bsags pa
130a6(mdo): bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdo sde bzhi ste/ bzhig pa zhe na/
130a7(mdo): 'du byed kyi mdo sde bsam gyis kye khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mdo sde bsam gyis mya khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mdo sde bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i mdo sde bsam gyis kyi
130a8(mdo): khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi mdo sde'i bsags pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mdo
130a9(mdo): sde bsags pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dnga' di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni
130b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mang du thos pa bzhi ste/ bzhi ga pa zhe na/ 'du byed mang du thos pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mang du thos pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa
130b2(mdo): mang du thos pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mang du thos pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi nor bsam
130b3(mdo): kyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i nor bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nor bsam kyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i nor bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di
130b4(mdo): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi bslab pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i bslab pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon
130b5(mdo): mongs pa'i bslab pa bsam kyis kyi khyab pa dang / rnam parabyang ba'i bslab pa'i bsam kyis kyi khyab pa dang / 'di bzhi'o/ gno du 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gyod yul ba'i ste/
130b6(mdo): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi spyod yul bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dpyod yul bsam kyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod yul bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / nam
130b7(mdo): par byang ba'i pyod yul bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las bzhi ste// bzhag zhe na/ 'du byed kyi las bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa
130b8(mdo): lilas bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i las bsam kyis myi khyab pa dpa'adi ba'i'o// gzho mu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa
130b9(mdo): ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi spobs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i spobs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spobs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i
131a1(mdo): spobs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho mu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi lam bsgom pa bzhi ste/ bzhi ga zhen/ 'du byed kyis bsgob nam kyi / 'du byed yongs su bshad
131a2(mdo): lam bsgom pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i lam bsgom pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i lam bsgom pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems
131a3(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su band pa shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis
131a4(mdo): mya khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi 'bras bu
131a5(mdo): yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang // kun nas nyon mongs po'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mya
131a6(mdo): khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsi gyis myi khyab pa 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma rig pa shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi
131a7(mdo): ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i mo rig pa
131a8(mdo): shes pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs
131a9(mdo): su bshad pa shes pa'i sdug bsngal shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal shes pa bsam kyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i sdug bsngal shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//
131b1(mdo): gzhomu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yid kyi bde ba shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi yid kyi bde ba shes pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i yid kyi bde ba shes pa bsam gyis
131b2(mdo): myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i yid myi bde ba shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i yid myi bde ba shes pa bsamo gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' nas
131b3(mdo): kyi dbul po shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi dbul po shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dbul po shes pa bsam gyis mya khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dbul po shes
131b4(mdo): pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i dbul po shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dpa' de bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skye ba shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi skye ba shes
131b5(mdo): pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongasu bshad pa'i skye bshes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i skye/ bshes pa bas ma byas kyi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i skye ba zhe
131b6(mdo): pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi nang shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs
131b7(mdo): su bshad pa'i nang shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nang shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i nang shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'ang bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dag /
131b8(mdo): rnams kyi 'i rol dashes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi phyi rol shes pa bsam kyis kyi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i phyi rol shes pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyi ros zhes pa bas
131b9(mdo): gyis kyi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyi rol shes pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo tsha ba shes pa'i ye shes bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi ngo tsha zhes pa'i ye ge
132a1(mdo): bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i ngo
132a2(mdo): she'i me ste bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi bden pa shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa
132a3(mdo): 'ibaden pa shes pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bden pa shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bden pa shes pa bsam kyis kyi khyab pa dnga'adi bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems
132a4(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi srid pa shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi srid pa shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i srid pa shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs po'i srid
132a5(mdo): pa shes pa bsamo kyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i srid pa shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chu/ ba sems dpa' rnams kyi dngos po shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe
132a6(mdo): na/ 'du byed kyi dngos po shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dngos po shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes pa'i ye shes dang sa tshams kyis kyi byab pa dang / rna bar byang ni dngo pa zhes mas kyis kyi byar pa dang nis
132a7(mdo): gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gang zag shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi gang bag shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i gang zag shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang /
132a8(mdo): kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gang zag shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i gang zag shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'di bzhi'o// gzho nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dmyigs pa shes pa bsam
132a9(mdo): byas mya khyab bsam gyis myi khyab par bstand pa bzhi ste/ mthar phyi dad pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ma yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi dmyigs pa shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad po'i
132b1(mdo): dmyigs pa'i shes pa bsam kyis myi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dmyigs pa shes pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i dmyigs pa zhes pa bsam kyis kyi khyab pa dang / 'di dag ni bya bachub sems dpa'
132b2(mdo): rnams kyi dmyigs pa shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab par bstan dpa bzhi ste/ de dag ni mthar phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba la yid no// gzungs pa'izhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mthal yas
132b3(mdo): par bshad pa brjod pa de la gang shes pa 'di ni gzungs dang po'o// dbyangs mtha' yas par bshad pa brjod pa de la gang shes pa 'di ni gzungs gnyis pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs pa mtha' yas par bshad pa brjod pa de la gang shes
132b4(mdo): pa de ni gzungs gsum pa'o// rnam par byang ba'i yon tan gyi phan yon mtha' yas par bshad pa brjod pa de la gang shes pa 'di ni gzungs bzhi pa ste/ gzungs bzhi po ni 'di dag go// gzho mu 'di ltar gzungs gapa yin
132b5(mdo): ba de ni shes pa'o// 'di ni chos so// 'di ltar chos shes pas chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o// chos shes pa de la don gang yin pa de ni don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// chos shes pa de la
132b6(mdo): 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// chos shes pa la tha snyad du ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / 'do/ sa pa dang / rab tu stond pa dang / rab tu 'bod pa dnga'abyed pa dang //
132b7(mdo): chos rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / tshig thogs pa myed pa dang / tshig myi 'dor zhing ma skugs kyi dag pa dang / tshig zhum pa myed pa 'do ni gzho nu spobs pas so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de nas
132b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// sangs rgyas ye shes ji snyed pa// gzugs su btags pa yang de snyed de// gzugs su btags pa ci snyed pa/ gzugs su brjod pa'ang de skad
132b9(mdo): do// gzugs su brjod pa ci snyed pa// tshul khrims myir yang de snyed de// tshul khrims mying yang ji snyed pa/ sangs rgyas mying yang de snyed do// sangs rgyas mying yang ci snyed pa/ sems can myeng yang de snyed do// sems
133a1(mdo): gcig kau myong yang ni// de snyed du ni ngas shes so// myong dang brjod pa mtha' yas pa// gang dag ngas ni sngar bshad nams// tshul khrims mying dang sangs rgyas mying // sems can mying dang de dag mtshungs// 'dus//
133a2(mdo): byas nyes pa ji snyed pa// mya ngan 'das sngags de snyed de// sangs rgyas kyi ni bsngags pa dang // dpe dang de snyed ngas bstan to// ci snyed sems can thams cad kyi// sems rnams skye ba ngas bstand pa// 'jig rten mgon po
133a3(mdo): 'i su gcig nas// 'od zer dag kyang de snyed 'byung // sems can kun gyi mos pa dang // mying rnams ji snyed yod pa bas// de bas myi'i dbang po yi// dbyangs kyi yan lag bsngags pa mang // sems can kun kyi mying yod
133a4(mdo): pa// de dag sems can de dag gcig la bstan// sems can gcig mying ji snyed pa// sems can kun kyi mying du bstan// so so yang dag rig 'jug pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' phyir/
133a5(mdo): yang ni// mying nga rnams mtha' yas nges par bstan// mdo sde bye bamatha' yas rnams// ji ltar bshad snyam gang sems pa// mdo sde/ 'di ni rab brjod la// zhum pa myed par bshad par gyis// 'khor
133a6(mdo): kyi nang du thogs myed par// mdo sde bye ba rab tu 'chang // ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' myed pa// de bzhin de yang chos rnams ston// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag/ sems can dag pa skyob pa
133a7(mdo): rnams// mdo sde 'di dag bzung nas ni// ye shes phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// dad pas ci lta ci lta bur// tshul 'di rab tu ston byed pa// de bzhin de'i ye shes 'phel// gangs ril ni sdong po bzhin//
133a8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu bzhi pa'o// / bam po// gzho nu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji
133a9(mdo): ltar chos yang dag par rig pa la dpyod na/ chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur zhe na// gzho mu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos nas
133b1(mdo): la chos kyi rjes su lta bas gzugs las gzhan du byang chub yang dag par rjes su myi mthong // gzugs las gzhan du yang byang chub la gyi pyod/ gzugs las gzhan du yang byang chub yongs su myi chos// gzugs las gzhan/
133b2(mdo): su yang byang chub yang dag par myi bsgrub// gzugs las gzhan du yang sems can nams byang chub la yang dag par myi 'dud// gzugs las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa kyi mthong ste/ gzugs kyi myi 'jig pa'i
133b3(mdo): nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes de bzhin gshegs par lta'o// gzugs kyang gzhan gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan no zhes de ltar gyi blta'o// gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang gzhan no// zhes de
133b4(mdo): ltar yang kyi blta'o// gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang / bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su byed pa'i chos nyid de// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar chos
133b5(mdo): so so yang dag par rig pa la pyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba las gzhan du ma yin/ 'du shes las gzhan du ma yin// 'du byed rnams/ las gzhan du ma yin te/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan du bya ba
133b6(mdo): chug myi mthong / rnam par shes pa las gzhan du byang chub la gyi pyod// rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang byang chub yongs su kye tshol// rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang byang chub yang dag par gyi bsgrub// rnam par
133b7(mdo): shes pa las gzhan du yang sems can rnams byang chub la rnga dag par myi 'dzud// rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi mthong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i myi 'jig pa'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes
133b8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs par blta'o// rnam par shes pa la yang gzhan rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan no zhes de ltar myi lta'o// rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang gzhan no zhes de ltar yang
133b9(mdo): myi lta'o// rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de gnyis su myed pa'i chos nyid de// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar lta na chos so so yang dag par rig pa la pyod do//
134a1(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gzugs kyis kya ni byang chub bstan// byang chub kyis kyang gzugs bstan te/ myi mtshungs pa'i sgra rnams kyis/ chos kyi
134a2(mdo): bla ma rab tu bstan// sgra'i sa gzugs kyi bla ma ste// ngo bo nyid kyis bab pa dag/ gzugs dang byang chub mnyam pa ste// tha dad bya ba de myi rnyed// mya ngan 'das pa zab par yang // sgra'is rab tu bstan pa ltar// mya ngan 'das
134a3(mdo): par gyi rnyed de// de'i sgra yang myi rnyed do// sgra dang mya ngan 'das pa ni// gnyi ga rnyed par myi 'gyur te// de bzhin stong pa'i chos rnams la// mya ngan 'das pa rab tu bstan// mya ngan 'das dpa'ada' ba ni// mya ngan 'das pa
134a4(mdo): myi rnyed de// 'di ni chos rnams 'jug myed pa// phyis ni ci 'dra de bzhin sngon// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis// mya ngan 'das dang mtshungs mnyam par// sangs rgyas bstan la brtson pa'i// 'byung
134a5(mdo): pa lhur byed rnams kyis rig/ sangs rgyas kyi ni sku mthong nas/ 'dren pa mthong zhes smra mod kyi// da ni gzugs kyi sku lus su// sus kyang blta bar mye nus so// gzugs kyi mtshan nyid mi 'dra bar
134a6(mdo): gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes te// gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes na/ nga yi sku yang nges par bstan// de bzhin phung po lnga rnams kyi// chos kyi mtshan nyid ngas shes te// chos kyi rang bzhin shes nas ni// chos
134a7(mdo): kyi sku la rab tu gnas// chos kyi sku la rab gnas nas// sems can rnams la chos ston to// chos kyi skul myi brten par// sems cad rnams la chos ston to// sangs rgyas dag gi chos rnams ni// tshig gis bshad par
134a8(mdo): myi nus te// 'od 'dra'i tshul rnams myi shes pas// sangs rgyas kyi ni sgra thos nas// tshig tsam gyis ni 'di skad smra// ngas ni 'dren pa mthong zhes te// 'du shes thams cad spangs pa la// srid par 'du shes myed par 'gyur//
134a9(mdo): sgrar ni 'du shes 'dzind pa la// nams kyang ston pa mthong ba myed// 'di lta bu'i gzugs kyi mtshan// stong pa nyid ni sus shes pa// gzugs kyi rang bzhin gzhan yin la// stong nyid gzhan du ma gsungs te// gang gi gzugs rnams
134b1(mdo): rab shes pa// des ni stong nyid rab tu shes// gzugs kyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra bar// stong pa gang gis rab shes pa// des ni bdud rnams bye ba snyed// zil kyis mnan te pham byed nus// gang gis gzugs rnams rab shes pa/
134b2(mdo): des ni stong pa nyid kyang shes// gang gis stong nyid rab shes pa// des ni mya ngan 'das pa shes// rnam pa 'di ni myi shes pas// dmyigs pa can rnams rab tu brlag// dngos po myed la dngos 'dzind cing // dngos myed la yang
134b3(mdo): dngos su 'dzin// shes kyi khye'i sa bskus pa dag/ pa'i stan las shin tu 'khyams// 'bras bur 'du shes gnas pa la// dge sbyong nor gyi gsog tu gyur // brtson 'grus nyams pa le lo can// tshul khrims phung por myi
134b4(mdo): gnas pa// kun nas langs pas smra ba ni// 'di ni sangs rgyas bshad ma yin// la la dag gi 'di skad du// bdag cag byang chub zhugs zhes zer// ma dul zhing ni ma byang ba// gcig la gcig kyang ri mo byed// chos
134b5(mdo): dag la ni myi gnas shing // sgra 'dod pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur// de lta bur ni de mos kyi// shes kyi khye ni tshol ba'i phyir// 'dus pa/ dag la sems byed cing // rnyed pa 'dod pa 'byung bar 'gyur// rgyags
134b6(mdo): dang bag myed zil non pas// rnyed dang bkur bsti don tu gnyer/ bkur bsti rnyad la rten nas ni// shes kyi khye rnams tshol ba dag/ tsug lag khang dang mchod rten byed// khyim mi mo la chags shing myos//
134b7(mdo): dmyigs pa dag la nyen byed cing // 'dod pa'i sred la shin tu gnas// bdud kyi yul du gnas nas ni// khyim pa dag gi las byed 'gyur// 'dod pa rtse sde 'dra ba ni// khyim pa dag la ston par 'gyur// de dag gi yang
134b8(mdo): khyim zhugs nas// de'i rigs kyang sun 'byed 'gyur// de dag la ni khyim pa rnams// ston pa nyid du 'du shes 'gyur// rab tu gnas bcas de dag gi// bu dang chung ma sun par byed// su dag de la zas skom gyis// pa
134b9(mdo): 'dogs pa ni byed par 'gyur// de'i bu dang bud myed la// chung ma nyid du 'du shes 'gyur// de dag 'dir ni rab byung nas// ji ltar gzhan gyi bud myed chags// khyim pa bdag gi chung ma la// de ltar myos shing chags myi 'gyur//
135a1(mdo): khyim pa skye bo'i gos gyod la// ngas ni bslab pa gang bshad pa// de tshe dge slong de dag la// bslab pa de yang myed par 'gyur// de dag rnga rdung rdza rnga yis// pal mchod pa byed 'gyur te// mchod pa'i dam pa gang yin pa
135a2(mdo): nan tan 'di ni myed par 'gyur// de dag bdag nyid tshul khrims 'chal// tshul khrims gnas pa mthong nas na// phan tshun du yang 'di skad du// 'di dag nged dpa' dra zhes smra// sdig pa'i spyod yul tshul khrims 'chal// de dag tshul
135a3(mdo): khrims bsngags zos nas// kun nas yangs pa 'di skad du// sangs rgyas mkhyend pa 'di myin smra// de dag la ni ngo tsha myed// dge sbyong gi ni nor stor te// myi bden tshig gis rtsod byed cing // sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu spong //
135a4(mdo): ngan sems ldan pa de dag ni// sangs rgyas bstand pa 'di bor te// chos rnams rab tu spangs nas ni// mnar myed par yang gnas par 'gyur// gang dag spyod pa de 'dra ba// ngas ni ma thos mthong ste// byis pa'i//
135a5(mdo): chos la gnas pa rnams// sangs rgyas ye shes thob myi 'gyur// de dag gi yang tshul 'chos dang // de la g.yo yang ci yod pa// thams// cad de bzhin ngas shes te// de la pa yi ye shes 'jug/ de'i 'khrul
135a6(mdo): pa mang po ni// gal te bskal par rab bshad kyang // byang chub sem sa dpar khas che yaM// cung zad tsam zhig brjod par 'gyur// gzho nur gyur da pa de dag ni// sdig pa myi byed yod myed de// phye mo'i dus la de dag dang /
135a7(mdo): khyod ni bsten par ma khyed cig/ smra ba dang gtam gyis la// de dag la ni ri mor gyis// byang chub dam pa'i don gyi phyir// zhum pa myed par bkur bsti kyis// lo grangs bu lon kun dris la// de dag rgan par gyur da na yang // de la
135a8(mdo): rim mo legs kyis la// rkang pa la yang 'gos phyag 'tshal// byang chub snying po rnam mthong na// de dag 'khrul pa myi lta'o// de la khong 'gro myi skyed cing // rtag tu byams pa'i sems su bya// gang gi 'khrul pa mi mthong yang /
135a9(mdo): de dag gi ni nyes myi brjod// ci 'dra ba'i las byas pa// 'bras bu/ de 'drar thob par 'gyur// bzhin gyi zla ba 'dzum bzhin du// rkan rabs dang ni gsar bu dang // rtag tu gsong por smra ba dang // des shing nga rgyal bcom par bya//
135b1(mdo): chos gos dang ni bsod snyoms kyis// de dag la ni phan gdags shing // 'di dag thams cad 'dren 'gyur zhes// de ltar khyod kyis sems zhog shi ka/ gal te chos kyi sbyin pa'i phyir// de dag khyod la gsol 'debs na/ dang por tshig
135b2(mdo): ni 'di dag smos// kho bos mtshungs myed ma bslabs so// 'di skad du ni tshig brjod de// tshe dang ldan pa mkhas shing rig// bdag nyid chen po'i mdun du ni// bdag gis ka la bshad nus smos// gya tsom du ni ma smra bar// de dag
135b3(mdo): ki ni snod rtogs la// snod du rung bar rig na ni// ma gsol bar yang bshad par gyis// tshul khrims 'chal pa 'khor nang na// mang du gnas par mthong na khyod// yo byad bsnyungs pa ma 'chad par// sbyin pa yi ni bsngags pa brjod
135b4(mdo): tshul khrims gtsang la rab gnas shing // ji ste 'dod pa nyung yod na// byams pa'i sems ni bskyed nas su// yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam gyis shig/ gal te sdig pa/ 'dod nyung zhing // tshul khrims ldan pa mang yod na// de tshe
135b5(mdo): phyogs rnyed gyur pa'i phyir// tshul khrims kyi yang bsngags pa brjod// thog mar 'khor rnams shes bya ste/ gal te gtsang yod de'i tshe/ dge ba'i chos rnams ji snyed pa// thams cad der ni rab tu bstan//
135b6(mdo): sprin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus bsam gtan tho sa pa dang // de bzhin 'dod nyung yo byad bsnyungs// rtag tu bsngags shing brjod par bya// dkon gnas bsam gtan ston pa dang // 'du
135b7(mdo): 'dzir gnas pa spang ba ni// de dag gzungs kyi sgo yin te// 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par byar// dkon par gnas pa myi spang zhing // tshul khrims la yang sbur myi bzung // nang du 'jog la sten bya zhing // sbyin pa la ni skur gyi bya/
135b8(mdo): tshul khrims phung por gnas nas ni// mang du thos pa bsgrub par bya// ting 'dzin 'di ni yongs btsal zhing // ston pa'i ring bsrel mchod par bya// ting 'dzin zhi ba btsal ba'i phyir// gdugs dang rgyas mtshan pa dan dang /
135b9(mdo): spos dang 'phreng ba byug pa yis// sangs rgyas la ni mchod par bya// dka' bar bya ba'i sil snyan dang // glu dbyangs sbyar cing blangs nas su// zhum pa myed cing mye gsel bar// sangs rgyas kyi ni ring srel mchod// byang chub mtsho
136a1(mdo): gi don gi phyir// spos dang 'phreng ba bdug pa dang // gos dang phye ma ji snyed pa// de dag kun gyis mgon mchod gis// ting 'dzin zhib 'di chos phyir// mchod pa ji snyed de yod pa// dpag myed bsam gyis/
136a2(mdo): myi khyab pas// sangs rgyas kun la mchod par gyis// bla myed sangs rgyas ye shes te// chags myed ye shes rab tshol bas// sems can kun la skal ba'i shas// myi gnas par ni mnyam par sbyin// myi gnas par ni
136a3(mdo): gyur nas su// ting 'dzid do zhi ba tshal ba 'chol ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams la ngas kyang sdod// mchod pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pas// sangs rgyas skye ba rnyed par dka'// phyir skye ba yang rnyed par dka'// bstan pa la yang
136a4(mdo): dad pa dang // rang byung bsnyen pa rdzogs rnyed par dka'// gang gis byang chub phyir bsngos pas// de dag ston pa mnyes par byas// dam bcas pa las ma g.yos par// khyod ni nan tan gnas par gyis// zad pa'i dus su nyer
136a5(mdo): gnas tshe// gang gis mdo sde 'di bzung ste// rab tu brjod pa ba/ dazung byas nas// myur du spobs pa thob par 'gyur// tshegs bcad gcig tsam bzung ba yang // bsod nams phung po bsam las na/
136a6(mdo): nyan par 'dod pas mdo sde yang // thams cad gzung ba ci na smos// sems can thams cad byang chub thob// de dag myi g.yes/ mchod byas te// bskal pa sems can snyed du yang // rtag tu gus
136a7(mdo): par mchod pa bas// ting nge 'dzind pa 'di las ni/ gang gis chags bcad gcig bzung ba// bsod nams snga ma thams cad ni// bcu drug char yang myi yod do// ting 'dzin 'di ni thos nas su// su dag nes nur gyi byed pa/
136a8(mdo): phan yon bsam gyis kyi khyab ste// sangs rgyas kyi ni mkhyen pas rig/ so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
136a9(mdo): zla 'od gzho nur gyur pal bka' ya la dpa// gzho nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
136b1(mdo): rgya bar 'dod pas thabs mkhas par bya'o// gzho nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na// gzho mu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad
136b2(mdo): la nye du'i sems nye bar gzhag ste// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po ci yod pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rjes su yi rang bar bya ste// nyin lan gsum mtshan
136b3(mdo): lan gsum sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po la rjes su yi rang nas// thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i sems bskyed pas// dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams kyi phung po de seMs/
136b4(mdo): can thams cad la btang bar bya'o// gzho nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de thabs mkhas pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan bas// myur du ting po 'dzin 'di thob cing myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par
136b5(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungasaso// sems can 'di dag thams cad bdag gi gnyen// 'di
136b6(mdo): bsod nams mang po ci yod pa// nyin yang lan gsum mtshan yangayan gsum du// byang chub sems bskyed rjes su yaM rang ngo // su dag srog gi phyir yang sdig myi byed// tshul khrims rnam par dag la yi rang /
136b7(mdo): ngo// byang chub sems dpal mos pa phun sum tshogs// de dag bsod nams ci yod yi rang ngo // gang dag sangs rgyas dad cing de bzhin du// chos dang dge 'dun dang la yi rang ngo // byang chub nyid ni rab tu 'dod pa'i phyir// bde
136b8(mdo): gshegs mchod pa byed la yi rang ngo // rdzogs pa'i byang chub gdung ni gnas bya'i phyir// sems can don tu blo gros chen po yis// bla myed byang chub dam pa mchog tu ni// gang gis sems bskyed de la yi rang ngo // byang chub
136b9(mdo): sems dpal snying rjes non pa yis// nor dang 'bru dang rin chen btsun mo dang // sras dang sras mo rgyal srid rgyas pa dang // bdag gi sha yang gtong la yi rang ngo // shes rab yongs su bsgoms pas lus dul zhing // thabs
137a1(mdo): la mkhas pa'i bslab pa rab bslabs pa// sems can don tu rab tu dga' sems kyis// bdag gi lus kyang gtong la yi rang ngo // gcig pu gnyis su myed par nags gnas shing // rtag tu bse ru ltar gyur/
137a2(mdo): 'tsho ba gtsang // 'or mor bya ba nyung zhing su dag ni// khe phyir tshul 'chos myed la yi rang ngo // su dag bsten par myi byed phra dog myed// khyim la sred par myi byed rtag par yang // khams gsum dag la rab tu 'jigs skrag
137a3(mdo): ste// 'jig rten ma chags spyod la yi rang ngo // sred par skye ba kun la rab skyo zhing // su dag spros pa myed la yi rang ngo // rtsod pa myed cing nye bar zhi ba'i sems// de la ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed myi dka'// gang gis 'du
137a4(mdo): 'janyes pa mthong nas ni// rtsod pa thams cad yongs spangs dkon par gnas// shing drung gnas shing rnam grol skur byed pa// bde gshegs sras la rjes su yi rang ngo // bdag la myi stod gzhan la myi smod cing /
137a5(mdo): dgon par gnas pa dag la yi rang ngo // su dag bstan pa 'di la bag yod cing // bag myed spangs pa de la yi rang ngo // byang chub phyog sa kyi chos rnams ji snyed pa// kun gyi rtsa ba bag yod 'di yin te//
137a6(mdo): sangs rgyas sras kag rtag tu bag yod pa// de dag ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed myi dka'// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstand pa gter rnyed yin// rab tu byung ba gter ni gnyis pa ste// dad pa rnyed pa gter
137a7(mdo): ni gsum pa yin// ting 'dzin 'di ni gter rnyed bzhi pa'o// sangs rgyas pyod yul stong pa 'di zos nas// de la myi spong ba yang gter rnyed yin// spobs pa mtha' yas pa yang gter rnyed pa// gzungs rnams gang yin de/
137a8(mdo): dag gter gyi mchog/ dge ba'i chos rnams ji snyed brjod pa dag/ tshul khrims thos gtong bzod pa de bzhin te// thams cad kyi yang rtsa ba bag yod 'di// gter rnyed yin par bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// sangs/
137a9(mdo): rgyas bstan pa 'di la bag yod cing // kun dag la ni yang dag smon lam yod// de dag ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed myi rgal// sangs rgyas bstand pa 'di la nye bar gyur da// rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o//
137b1(mdo): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzho nur gyur pa la bka' sal pa// gzho nu de lta bas na bag yod par bya'o zhes// gzho nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzho nu bag yod pa'i byang chub
137b2(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par mya dka' na// ting nge 'dzin 'di lta ci smos// gzho nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bag yod pa
137b3(mdo): yin zhe na// gzho mu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yin no// kazho nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ gzho nu 'di la
137b4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dpas bral bas/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug/ la pyod pa yin te/ de'i phan yon 'di dag nyon cig dang / ngas khyod la
137b5(mdo): bshang ngo // gzhodu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin ba la mos pa'i phan yos de bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 9'i ser sna'i nyon mongs pa char bcad pa yin// de'i sems rtag tu/
137b6(mdo): gtong ba'i rjes su dbrel ba yin// skye bo mang po dang thun mong ba 'i longs spyod las snying por len pa yin// longs paspyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing skyes ma thag tu gtong ba'i sems mngon tu 'gyur ba yid/
137b7(mdo): 'khor ba'i rnams la 'phangs shing sdug pa yin// 'jigs pa byed cing zhum pa byed par 'khor gyi nang du 'gro// phyogs dang phyogs 'arnams su de'i bya rer brjod pa'i sgra rigs su bcad pa mngon par 'byung // rgalag 'dra/
137b8(mdo): zhing bzhon pa yin/ rkang 'bil mnyam zhing rab tu gnas pa yin// byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang myi 'bral ba yin te// gzhon byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa la mos pa'i
137b9(mdo): legs pa ni 'di bcu'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// des ni ser sna tshar bcad cing // gtong ba'i sems kyang rnam par spel// snying po dag ni blangs par 'gyur// shi na tu 'byor pa'i rigs su skye// skyes ma thag tu de'i sems//
138a1(mdo): gtong ba dag la shin tu 'jug/ rab tu byung dang khyim pa'i// sems can rnams la phangs par 'gyur// 'jigs pa myed cing 'khor du yang // ma zhum par ni nye bar 'gro// grong dang grong khyer rnams su yang // de'i
138a2(mdo): sgra ni rgya cher 'gyur/ 9/ rka lag dag ni 'jam pa yang // rnyed dka' bar ni yongs myi 'gyur// sangs rgyas dang ni nyan thos dang // dge ba'i bshes gnyen thob par 'gyur// ser sna'i sems ni nam yang mya 'byung ste// de'i sems
138a3(mdo): ni rtag tu gtong la dkal// sems can bye ba mngal 'phags par 'gyur// ser sna myed pa'i lan yon 'di dag yin// de ni nor mang rigs su skye bar 'gyur// skyes nas de'i yid ni gtong la dka'// snying po blangs nas 'chig
138a4(mdo): 'i dus byed 'gyur/ sem sna myed pa'i lan yon 'di dag yin// 'jigs zab byed par 'khor gyi nang du 'gro/ phyogs su rgya cher de'i sgra yang grag/ de'i rga lag rtag tu 'jas par 'gyur// ser sna myed pa'i phan yon
138a5(mdo): 'di dag yin// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par myi dka' ste// des ni sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos mthong // mthong nas de dag dad pas mchod pa byed// ser sna myed pa'i phan yon 'di dag yin//
138a6(mdo): sbyin pa'i phan yon gyi le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// // / gzhon byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims me yongs su dag pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
138a7(mdo): lta ste/ ye shes kyis rjes su bskor cing yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su slob pa dang / mkhas pa rnams kyis ma smad pa dang / dam bcas pa las kyi g.yo ba dang // nan tan la gnas pa dang /
138a8(mdo): 'khor ba las 'byos pa dang // mya ngan las 'das la yob pas byed pa dang // kun nas sdang ba skyed par gnas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa dang / myi dbul bar 'gyur te// gzho nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' pos
138a9(mdo): dpa' chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i lan yon no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// ye shes yongs su rdzogs byed cing / sangs rgyas dag gi rjes su slob// mkhas pa dag gis ma spang pa// rtag tu 'jigs pa myed par
138b1(mdo): 'gyur// dam bcas pa las myi g.yo zhing // nan tan la yang rab tu gnas// mya ngan 'das pa thob byed cing // 'khor ba las kyang rab tu 'byol// kun nas ldang ba myed gnas shing // ting nge 'dzind rnams myur du thob// dbul
138b2(mdo): por ya ni gyi 'gyur te// tshul khrims phung por rab tu gnas// de'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rjes su slob// de ltar de'i tshul khrims yongs dag cing // de la mkhas pa dag ni sprod kyi
138b3(mdo): byed// dam bcas pa las myi g.yo zhing // de ltar dpa' bo nan tan gnas par byed// 'khor ba'i nyes pa mang po mthong nas ni// 'byol zhing mya ngan 'da' bar de yis 'gro// de ltar tshul khrims stobs la gnas pas na// de'i/
138b4(mdo): sems ni kun nas ldang myi 'gyur// nyon mongs myed pa'i ting 'dzind/ myur du 'thob// tshul khrims dag pa'i phan yon 'di dag yin// // tshul khrims nges par bstand pa'i le'u ste nyi
138b5(mdo): shu brgyad pa'o// / gzho nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa la gnas shing // byams pa la spyod pa'i phan yon ni 'di lta ste// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
138b6(mdo): myes myi tshig/ mtshon kyis myi song/ dug gis myi tshugs/ chus mye 'chi// lha rnams de la bsrung bar byed// lus mtshan gyis brgya/ na pa 'thob par 'gyur// de'i ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad bcad
138b7(mdo): par 'gyur te/ de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba rnyed par myi dka' bar 'gyur// de bde bar nyin mtshan 'da' bar 'gyur// de'i lus la dka' ba dang / bde ba myi 'dor bar 'gyur te// gzho nu byang chub sems dpal sa
138b8(mdo): dpa' chen po bzod pa la gnas pa/ byams pa spyod pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// de ni myes kyang myi tshig ste// mtshon gyis kyang ni sod myi 'gyur// lus la dug gis myi tshugs te/
138b9(mdo): chus kyang 'chi bar myi 'gyur ro// de la lha rnams bsrung byed de// sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan kyang 'byung // de'i ngan 'gro kun bkag ste// bzod la gnas pa'i phan yon 'di// tshangs pa dang brgya byin yang // de la rnyed
139a1(mdo): pa dka' myi 'gyur// rtag tu bde bar gnas byed cing // dga' ba dag kyang bsam yas 'gyur// de ni mye dang mtshon kyis yod myi sod// bye brag du ni chu nang myi 'chi ste// lha dang klu dang de bzhin gnod sbyin
139a2(mdo): bsrung // byams pa la gnas pa'i phan yon 'di dag go// de laM lus la sum bcu gnyis mtshan 'byung // de ni phyir yang log ltung 'gro myi 'gyur// shi 'phos nas na tshangs pa'i gnas su skra// bzod la gnas
139a3(mdo): po'i phan yon 'di dag go// de ni nyin mtshan dag kyang bde bar gda'// lus ni dga' bas rtag tu khyab par 'gyur// bzod cing nges pa'i stobs la de gnas pas// mkhas pa rtag tu dang ba'i sems su 'gyur//
139a4(mdo): gzho nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bsnyen dka' bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung ba
139a5(mdo): 'thob pa dang / lhas yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang // des zos pa'i chos yongs su myi nyams pa dang // sngon ma thos pa'o// chos rnams 'thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs 'thob pa dang / nang
139a6(mdo): nyung bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i zas rnams kyang yang dag par bde bar 'ju bar 'gyur ba dang / pad ma lta bur 'gyur zhing mda' ste'u ka ma lta bur myi 'gyur ba ste// gzho nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
139a7(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i phan yon no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// bsnyen dka' bar yang rtag tu 'gyur// de la le lo yod myin te// lha rnams kyang ni bsrung bar byed// sangs rgyas dag ni
139a8(mdo): myur du mthong // smon lam yongs su rdzogs byed de// ting 'dzin rigs ni rnyed par 'gyur// de la rad kyang kyi 'byung ste// brtson 'grus ldan pa'i yon tan 'di// de'i bas dang skom dag kyang // bde bar 'du ste myang
139a9(mdo): myed// chu'i nang na ud pa la dag/ rim kyis skye bar 'gyur ba ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yang // dkar po'i chos kyis rnam par 'phel// de'i nyin dang mtshan mo yang // 'bras bu yod par 'da' bar 'gyur//
139b1(mdo): brtson 'grus brtsams pa de bzhin gshegs// bskal pa du mar bsgrub pa yis// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ldan// de'i phan yon 'di dag bshad// des pa brtson 'grus brtsams 'gyur te// rgyal ba dag gis
139b2(mdo): yongs su bzung // lha yang de la smon pa skyed// sangs rgyas byang chub myur 'tshang rgya// de'i thos pa yod myi bri// chos gzhan mang po smra bar byed// de'i spobs pa rgya cher 'phel// brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i phan yon 'di// /
139b3(mdo): ting 'dzind rigs kyang myur du 'thob// de la nam yang nad kyi 'byung // des ni kha zas ci zos pa// bde bar yongs su 'ju bar 'gyur// myi ka yel brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i// dkar po'i phyogs ni nyin mtsham 'phel/
139b4(mdo): de ltar brtson 'grus stobs ldan pas// ring por mye thogs byang chub 'gyur// gzho nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la mos pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta
139b5(mdo): ste spyod pa la gnas pa dang / spyod yul pyod pa dang / yongs su gdung ba myed par gnas pa dang / dbang po sbas par 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba myong ba dang / 'dod pa las dben pa dang / bsam gtan
139b6(mdo): gsog ma yin pa dang / bdud kyi yul las tha rad pa dang / sang sa rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gnas pa dang / rnam par grol ba rab tu sbyin par byed pa ste// gzho nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' seMs
139b7(mdo): dpa' chen po bsam gtan la mos pa'i phan yon no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ spyod pa dag la de gnas pas// de'i spyod pa myed myi 'gyur// rnal 'byor da pa ni spyod yul pyod// spyod yul ma yin rnam par spong // gdung
139b8(mdo): ba myed par de gnas te// dbang po bsdams shing sbas pa yin// de ni dga' ba myong byed de// bsam gtan bsgom pa'i spyod yul lo// 'dod pa'i sred la 'dod chags bral// bsam gtan bde la sten byed de// bdud kyi
139b9(mdo): yul las de tha rad cing // sangs rgyas yul la de gnas so// rnal 'byor dbye brag 'di yin te// gcig pu nags khrod mos byed cing // rnam par grol ba yongs su skong // de ni bcu pa'i gnas yin no// byang chub seMs
140a1(mdo): dpa' de ni spyod la gnas// spyod pa ma yin thams cad rnam par spong // spyod yul ma yin spangs nas spyod yul gnas// ting 'dzin brtson pa'i phan yon 'di dag go// de la gdung ba nam yang gdung myi
140a2(mdo): 'gyur// 'phags pa'i bden par gnas pa reg nas su// lus dang sems rnams kyang ni bde bar 'gyur// bsam gtan brtson pa'i phan yon 'di dag go// dgon pa'i gnas dag tu yang bsrungs shing gnas// de la
140a3(mdo): g.yem pa nam yang 'byung myi 'gyur// de ltar lus ni dben par gyur pas na// zang zing myed pa'i dka' ba der 'thob po// 'dod pa dag gis myi gos nyon mongs myed// de ltar bdud kyi yul las tha rad pas na// de bzhi
140a4(mdo): gshegs pa'i yul la rab gnas te// de'i rnam grol yongs su smyon par 'gyur// gzhonu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab spyod pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta
140a5(mdo): ste/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong la sbyin pas dag pararlom sems su myi byed pa yin/ tshul khrims ma dral cing tshul zhi/ mas la myi gnas pa yin// bzod pa'i stobs la gnas la
140a6(mdo): sems can du 'du shes pa la myi gnas pa yin// brtson 'a grus brtsams pa la lus dang sems dben pa yin// bsam gten la bsam gtan du byed cing myi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa yin// /
140a7(mdo): bdud rnams kyis thub par dka' ba yin// pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis rab tu myi bskul pa yin// 'du byed 'jug pa thams cad la snang ba thob pa yin// sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po rgya cher 'jug pa
140a8(mdo): ste// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la le ba myed pa yin// sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la rab tu 'jug pa yin te// gzho nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
140a9(mdo): sems dpa' chen po shes rab spyod pa'i phan yon yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dpa' bo bdog pa thams cad gtong // des ni dag par rlom sems myed// tshul khrims ma ral srang mod kyi// de la gnas par byed pa
140b1(mdo): myed// shes rab can de bzod bsgom yang // sems can 'du shes rnam par bzlog/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin mod kyi// lus dang sems ni rnam par dben/ bsam gtan la yang bsgom mod kyi// gnas pa myed//
140b2(mdo): cing rten pa myed// bdud kyis thub par dka' bar 'gyur// shes rab ldan pa'i yon tan 'di// pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis// de ni bskyod par myi nus 'gyur// 'khor ba na yang snang ba 'thob// shes rab yon tan
140b3(mdo): 'di 'dra'o// sems can dag ni thams cad la// de ni snying rje che bar 'gyur// nyan thos nga rgyal ye shes la// nam yang re ba skyed myi 'gyur// bdog pa thams cad gtong yang rlom sems myed// tshul khrims ma ral tshul
140b4(mdo): khrims myi gnas te// bzod pa bsgom yang sems can 'du shes myed// shes rab mos pa'i phan yon 'di dag go// brtson 'grus brtsams kyang rnam par dben pa yin// myi gnas bsam gtan byed cing rten pa myed
140b5(mdo): mkhas pa de ni bdud kyis thub par dka'// shes rab mos pa'i phan yon 'di dag go// pha rol rgol bas bskyod par myi 'gyur zhing // des ni 'dus byas 'di'i gting rnyed pas// sems can dag la
140b6(mdo): rje rgya cher skyed// shes rab mos pa'i phan yon 'di dag go// de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan de gnas pas// rang rgyas rnams dang nyan zos rnams la ni// de dag nam yang smond pa myi skyed de// shes
140b7(mdo): rab mos pa'i phan yon 'di dag go// gzhon byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang du thos pa'i phan yon ni 'dil69/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kun nas nyon mongs par myi byed pa dang / gnod sems kyi skyed/
140b8(mdo): pa dang / the tsom rnam par 'byed pa dang // lta ba drang por byed pa dang / lam log pa spong ba dang / lam la gnas pa dang / mya 'chi ba'i sgor gnas pa dang // byang chub tu bsnyen pa dang / sems can thams cad la snang bar gyur
140b9(mdo): pa dang // ngan 'gro thams cad kyis myi 'jigs pa ste// gzho nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang du zos pa'i phan yon no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ yang dag ji bzhin mkhyen pa yi//
141a1(mdo): sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa yis// mang du thos pa'i phan yon ni// bcu po 'di dag rab tu bshad// nyon mongs rnam par byang ba'i phyogs gnyis po ni des shes te/ kun nas nyon mongs yongs spangs
141a2(mdo): nas// rnam par byang ba'i lam la sten// nem nur rnam 'byed ye shes ldan// lta ba dang por rab srong zhing // log pa'i lam yang rnam spangs te/ drang po'i lam la gnas par byed// myi 'chi'i sgo la de gnas shing // byang
141a3(mdo): chub tu yang nye bar 'gyur// sems can la yang snang 'gyur te// ngan song dag la 'jigs pa myed// kun nas nyon mongs chos mngarab shes shing // rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyang de bzhin shes// kun nas nyon mongs rab tu
141a4(mdo): spangs nas ni// rnam par byang ba'i chos kyi mchog la slob// srog chags kun kyi nem nur rnam 'byed cing // de'i lta ba rtag tu drang por 'gyur// de ni log pa'i lam yang rnam spangs te// zhi ba drang po'i lam la rtag tu gnas/
141a5(mdo): mye 'chi'i lam la khor mor gnas 'gyur zhing // dr-i myed byang chub la yang nye bar 'gyur// srog chags mang po kun la'ang snang bar yin/ de ni ngan 'gro dag la'ang 'dzegs pa myed// gzho nu byang chub ses
141a6(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sbyin pa lhur byed pa/ gzhan la chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bya ba ma yin pa rnam par spong ba dang / bya ba
141a7(mdo): la 'jug pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i chos la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po thob par byed pa dang / dngos po yongs su gtong ba dang / nyon mongs pa tshar gcod pa dang / sems
141a8(mdo): can thams cad la skal ba'i shes sbyin pa dang / de la dmyigs pa'i byams pa sgom pa dang / cha 'di la bde ba thob pa ste/ gzho nu chos bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyi chos kyi sbyin pa sbyi
141a9(mdo): bar byed pa'i phan yon no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ su dag ser sna myed pa ni// chos kyi sbyin pa mchog sbyin byed// de'i legs pa rnam bcur ni// 'jig rten mgon pos rab tu bshad // bya ba ma yin thams cad spong /
141b1(mdo): mkhas pa bya ba rnams la 'jug/ skyes bu dam pa'i chos la dang // gtong ba'i sems la sten par byed// sangs rgyas zhing yang nas sbyong ste// de'i zhing ni bsam gyi khyab// byang chub snying por rtag 'dug pa/
141b2(mdo): chos kyi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'di// dngos po thams cad gtong byed cing // chos kyi rgyal po'i rjes su slob// nyon mongs pa tshar bcad pa// de la byang chub rnyed kyi dka'// sems can kun la bskal pa'i nas// byas
141b3(mdo): pa'i sems kyis rab tu sbyin// de ni phrag dog myed 'gyur te/ myi ma yin pa'i sgrib pa 'thob// mkhas pas bya ba ma yin nam spangs te// rtogs pa bya ba dag la gnas par byed// mkhas pa su dag chos kyi sbyir ba
141b4(mdo): gtong // bdag nyid chen po 'ichos la rtag tu gnas// de'i zhing yang rnam par dag par 'gyur// byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams rnam par 'phel// byang chub snying por rtag tu nye bar gyur// chos rnams sbyid pa'i phan yon
141b5(mdo): 'di dag ko// nyon mongs myed cing dngos po yongs su gtang / dngos po rang gi mtshan nyid yongs su shes// yongs su 'dzin par g.yas rnam par grol// de la chags pa nam yang yod sbyin
141b6(mdo): mkhas pa'i sems ni shin tu nyer bzhag pa// sems can thams cad bde bar gyur cig ces// de ni byams sems 'gyur zhing phrag dog myed// tshe 'di dag la yang bde ba kyi nyub 'gyur// gzho nu
141b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i lan yon ni 'di bcu ste/ bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa la gnas pa dang / kye gnas par bsam gtan byed pa dang / skye ba la kye
141b8(mdo): smon pa dang / tshul khrims la mchog tu kye 'dzin pa dang / 'phags pa la gyi skur pa dang // myi 'gal bar gnas pa dang / dngos po myi dmyigs pa dang / dben par gyurd pa dang / sangs rgyas la skur pa myi 'debs pa dang /
141b9(mdo): ngam pa'i chos 'dzid da pa ste/ gzho mu bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i phan yon no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gyi dbang bar gnas pa gang yin pa// sangs rgyas
142a1(mdo): kun gyi spyod yul te// des ni rnal 'byor de gnas par byed// de la srog rnams dmyigs pa myed// 'jig rten kun la myi gnas shing // 'phags pa'i bsam gtan myi gtong ste// chos kyi rang ba'i//
142a2(mdo): mthong nas ni/ skye ba la yang smon myi byed/ tshul khrims mchog tu myi 'dzind cing // tshul khrims la yang gnas myi byed// zag pa myed pa'i lam gzhan la/ cung zad skur par de myi byed// 'gal ba myed par da gnas/
142a3(mdo): shing // rtsod pa dag kyang yod myi byed// rnal 'byor de dngos po myi dmyigs shing // rtag tu dben par gnas par byed// de dag srog gi don phyir yang // sangs rgyas skur pa myi 'debs te// stong pa nyid la nges gyur
142a4(mdo): cing // lus kyis mngon gsum 'jigs pa myed// 'jig rten mgon po thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas byang chub bsam gyi khyab// gus par byas nas chos 'dzin te// sangs rgyas chos la nem nur myed// ka
142a5(mdo): dag mu stegs mang po'i sa ma yin// skyes bu khyu mchog dag tu gnas pa de// gapal srog mye dgang bag sems cad byed// de sa byang chub sems dpa' gnas par byed// de la gnas pan
142a6(mdo): yang yod ma yin// kyi gnas par ni gzhag na// chos la sem sa can bdag myed nas rig nas// skye bar yang ni 'du shes yong rgya 'byung // chos rnams kyi de rang bzhin rnam par rig/ tshul
142a7(mdo): khrims la yang nub zad gnas pa myed// rdus khrims kyis mi dag par yod kyi sems// sangs rgyas dag la rtag tu dad par byed// thams cad rang bzhidi steng pa mnapa bsgoms pas// de la 'gal pa dam yang 'byung
142a8(mdo): kyi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i das chos bzung nas ni// 'dren pa dag la nas yang kyi skur to// gzho su bya bachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang dusang dag 'jog la mngon par brtson pa'i phan son ni 'di cu
142a9(mdo): ste// bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ sems rtog pa myed pa dang bag yod par gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / gyod pa la dad pa dang / ye shes la des nur byed pa dang / sangs rgyas la byas pa gso ba dang / chos
142b1(mdo): myi spong ba dang / shin tu bsdams par gnas pa dang / dul ba'i sa rjes su thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mngon sum du byed pa ste// gzho nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang du
142b2(mdo): yang dag 'jog la mngon par brtson pa'i phan yon no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de'i sems ni rnyog pa myed// bag myed thams cad nam spangs te// bag yod pa la gnas byed cing // yang dag 'jog la 'apyod yul ba//
142b3(mdo): 'jig rten ma gon gyi myed thos nas// sangs rgyas la da par byed// sangs rgyas le shes bsas kyi khyab// legs nas 'byor dge cos byed// sangs rgyas rnams la byas pa ga'o// sangs rgyas chos la the cos byed/
142b4(mdo): shinang tu gnas shing bsdams byed de// dul ba'i sa la rab tu gnas// yang dag rig pa des 'thob ste// rnyed dang bkur sti spangs nas su// gcig pu nags khrod mos par byed// yang dag 'jog la gyod/
142b5(mdo): yul ba// de'i sems ni rnyog pa myed par gyur // bag myed pa/ yang thams cad yongs spangs te// bdag nyid chen po rtag tu bag yod 'gyur// te 'dzin brtson pa'i phan yon 'di dag go//
142b6(mdo): rkang gnyis so bo sangs rgyas dran nas ni// de'i myod pa bla na myed la dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen la the com byed// bsam gtan brtson pa'i phan yod 'di dag go// sangs rgyas dag la
142b7(mdo): rtag tu byas pa ga'o// de ni srog gi phyim yang chos kyi spong // thams cad dus su shin tu bsdams par gnas// ting 'dzin brtson pa'i phan yon 'di dag go// shis tu dul ba lis ni rjes 'thob cing // yang dag pa'i/
142b8(mdo): pa myur du mngon gsum byed// tshig gi rgyun gyi 'chad cing spobs par ldan// mdo sde bye ba khrag zhig ston par byed// sangs rgyas byang chub myur du de 'dzin te// 'dren pa dag gi bstan pa yongs su bsrung // des ni
142b9(mdo): pha rol rgol ba kun bcom ste// / sangs rgyas kyi yang byang chub rgyas par byed// byang chub seMs dpa' de ni shi 'phos nas// bde ba can kyi 'jig rten khasu 'gro// tshe dpag myed las chos ba sda man sngo r+tha// skye ba mye pA chos la bzod pa thob//
143a1(mdo): bam po / gzho nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon par gnas pa lhur byed pa dag gi phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/ bcu gang zhen
143a2(mdo): 'di lta ste/ bya ba nyung bar gnas pa dang / 'du ba ring ba nas kyang ring du spong ba dang / de la rtsod pa myed par 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa myed par gnas pa dang / zad pa 'phel bar myi byed pa dang / rtsod pa'i gzhi myi byed pa
143a3(mdo): dang / sha nad tu zhi bar spyod pa dang / sha nad tu bsdams par gnas pa dang / tha rad pa dang mthun pa'i sems kyi rgyud du 'gyur ba dang / myur du rnam par grol ba mngon gsum du byed pa ste// gzho nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang
143a4(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgon par gnas pa lhur byed pa'i phan yon no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rtag tu bya ba nyung par 'gyur// 'du'aji dag kyang ring du spong // nags khrod gcig pu
143a5(mdo): gnas pa ni// rtsod pa dag kyang de la myed// gnod pa myed po'i sems kyis ni// zag pa myed par 'phel myi byed// de/ la rtsod gzhi myi 'byung ste// dgon par gnas pa'i yon tan 'di
143a6(mdo): lus dang ngag yid rab bsdams te// de ni nye bar zhi bar spyod// za rad pa dang ni mthun gyur da cing // rnam par grol bar myur du reg/ rnal 'byord pa ni rtag tu bya ba nyung // 'du 'dzamang po'i nyes
143a7(mdo): pa kun spangs te// rnal 'byor da pa dag nam yang rtsod myi byed// dgon par gnas pa'i phan yon 'di dag go// nam zhig de ni 'dus byas skyo 'gyur cing // 'jig rten du ni ka pa la yang 'dod pa myed// zag
143a8(mdo): pa dag kyang 'phel bar myi byed pa// nags khrod gnas pa de'i phan yon yin// de la cod gzhi nam yang kyi 'byung ste// rtag tu zhal dgal zhing dben par myong // sus dang ngag dang yid kyang bsdams pa ste/
143a9(mdo): dgon par gnas pa de la yon tan mang // de ni za rad pa dang yang mthun 'gyur te// nags khrod gnas shing rnam krol de sten pas// rnam grol zhi ba myur du des rtogs 'gyur// 'di kun dkon par gnas pa'i phan yon
143b1(mdo): gzhonu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod snyoms dpyod pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang // yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa'i lan yon ni 'di bcu ste// bcu ga pa zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ doshes kyi khye 'dod pa ma yin lnga/
143b2(mdo): dang / de snyan pa 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / de rnyed pa dang / bkur ba ste 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / de 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la gnas pa dang / de tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag myed par 'gyur ba dang / de bdag la myi stod gzhan la
143b3(mdo): bya spong ba dang / de rjes su chags pa dang / de khong 'khro ba spangs pas gzhan gyi khyim du pyod pa dang / bang bar byed par chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang / de sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pas gnas shing chos bstan
